column2: Please note that we vietnamvisavoa.com are not Vietnam Embassy/ Consulate or Government site. We are non-government website run by a private company. However, being a travel agency in Vietnam, we work legally under business law and immigration law of Vietnam in order to arrange approval letter for clients at Vietnam Immigration Department. Clients will be able to pick up your visa on arrival at International airports of Vietnam. We confirm that Vietnam visa on arrival at the airports is legitimated & supported by Vietnam Immigration Department.

We are established legally under the laws of Vietnam & we must provide documents to Vietnam Immigration Department in order to get approval letter for your visa on arrival at Vietnam International Airports. Therefore, we have to charge you a fee called service fee in order to prepare papers, documents, send courier to submit your visa applications, queuing to get approval letter and scan to send it to your email, making sure your visa run smoothly on arrival at the airport of Vietnam. Apart from official fee for your visa approval letter, you need to pay for stamping fee at Vietnam airport. It's $25USD/pp for single entry visa of 1 month or 3 months; $50USD/pp for multiple entries visa 1 month or 3 months (According to Circular No. 190/2012/TT-BTC on November 09, 2012 approved and signed by Vietnam Finance Ministry.

Please note that we are not Vietnam Embassy / Consulate or Government site. We are non-government website run by a private company. However, we do work legally under Vietnam business law and Vietnamese immigration law in order to arrange approval letter at Vietnam Immigration Department. Accordingly, Vietnam visa on arrival at airports is legitimate & supported by Vietnam Immigration Department.

We must establish legally under the laws of Vietnam & we must provide paperwork to the Vietnam Immigration Department in order to get approval letter for your visa on arrival at Vietnam International Airports. Therefore we have to charge you a fee that we called service fee. Apart from that, you must pay for stamping fee in cash at Vietnam Airport to collect your stamped visa. It's $25USD/person for single entry visa of 1 month or 3 months; $50USD/person for multiple entries visa of 1 month or 3 months.
请注意，我们的vietnamvisavoa.com不是越南大使馆/领事馆或政府网站，我们是一家私营公司经营的而非政府网站。然而，作为在越南的一家旅行社，我们是依据公司法和越南的移民法依法经营的，以便在越南入境事务处为客户安排批准函。客户将在越南国际机场拿到落地签证。我们确定，在越南机场拿到的落地签证是合法的并且受到越南入境事务处的支持。
我们必须依照越南的法律办事，并且我们必须提供文件给越南入境事务处，以便你在抵达越南国际机场时能拿到你的落地签证。因此，我们必须向您收取一定的服务费，以准备资料，文档，发快递提交您的签证申请，排队获得批准函，并扫描将其发送到您的电子邮箱，并确保您的签证顺利到达越南的机场。
除了你在机场的落地签的官费，也叫印章费或移民费之外，还有1个月单次或3个月一次的25美金/人，50美金/人1个月或3个月多次往返（根据通告第190号/ 2012 / TT-BTC于2012年11月09日，越南财政部批准和签署）。
Legal basis for Vietnam visa on arrival at international airports of Vietnam :

ORDINANCE ON ENTRY, EXIT AND RESIDENCE OF FOREIGNERS IN VIETNAM (No. 24/2000/PL-UBTVQH10 of April 28, 2000) approved & singed on April 28, 2000 by Mr Nong Duc Manh - Chairman of Vietnam National Assembly saying that
Article 2.-

1. Vietnamese agencies and organizations, Vietnam - based foreign agencies and organizations as well as international organizations, Vietnamese citizens and foreigners lawfully residing in Vietnam may invite foreigners into Vietnam.

2. Agencies, organizations and individuals that invite foreigners into Vietnam shall have to ensure the compliance with foreigners' entry purposes, ensure financial matters and their cooperation with the State bodies to settle arising problems for foreigners.
DECREE No. 21/2001/ND-CP OF MAY 28, 2001 DETAILING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE ORDINANCE ON ENTRY, EXIT AND RESIDENCE OF FOREIGNERS IN VIETNAM approved & signed by Prime Minister Phan Van Khai saying :
Article 5.-

1. Agencies assigned to assume the prime responsibility for receiving foreign guests into Vietnam at the invitation of the Party Central Committee, the National Assembly, the State President or the Government and guests of the equivalent level of ministers, vice ministers, presidents or vice presidents of the People's Committees of the provinces and centrally-run cities, shall send written notices on the invitation and reception of foreign guests to the Consular Department of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs. The Consular Department of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs shall notify the Vietnamese diplomatic missions or consular offices in foreign countries thereof, so that the latter grant visas to the above-said invited guests, and at the same time notify such to the Exit and Entry Management Department of the Ministry of Public Security.

For foreigners entering to work at the foreign diplomatic missions or consular offices, representative offices of the United Nations' international organizations, the inter-governmental organizations based in Vietnam and their accompanying next of kin and servants, the above-said agencies shall have to send written notices on the invitation and reception of foreign guests to the Consular Department of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs. The Consular Department of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs shall notify such in writing to the Exit and Entry Management Department of the Ministry of Public Security before notifying and requesting the Vietnamese diplomatic missions or consular offices in foreign countries to grant visas.

Within 2 working days after receiving the written notices, if it detects that the invited foreigners fall into cases not yet permitted for entry, the Exit and Entry Management Department of the Ministry of Public Security shall inform such to the Consular Department of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs.

2. Agencies, organizations and individuals that invite foreigners into Vietnam who are not specified in Clause 1 of this Article shall send written notices or requests to the Exit and Entry Management Department of the Ministry of Public Security.

The Exit and Entry Management Department of the Ministry of Public Security shall notify its approval to the Vietnamese diplomatic mission or consular offices in foreign countries so that the latter grant visas to invited foreigners within 5 working days after the written notices or requests are received. If it detects that the invited foreigners fall into cases not yet permitted for entry, the Exit and Entry Management Department of the Ministry of Public Security shall inform the inviting agencies, organizations and/or individuals thereof.

3. Agencies, organizations and/or individuals that wish to have visas granted at Vietnam's international border-gates to foreigners falling into cases specified in Article 6 of the Ordinance shall send written requests to the Exit and Entry Management Department of the Ministry of Public Security. In cases of application for visa granting at border-gates for urgent reasons, the written requests therefor must be filed at least 12 hours before the invited foreigners arrive at the border-gates.

JOINT CIRCULAR No. 04/2002/TTLT/BCA-BNG OF JANUARY 29, 2002 GUIDING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE GOVERNMENT?S DECREE No. 21/2001/ND-CP OF MAY 28, 2001 DETAILING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE ORDINANCE ON ENTRY, EXIT AND RESIDENCE OF FOREIGNERS IN VIETNAM approved & signed on January 29, 2002 by Vietnam Foreign Affair Ministry & Vietnam Public Security saying
2. For foreigners liable to carry out procedures at the Ministry of Public Security

a/ Agencies and organizations, which wish to invite into Vietnam foreigners who are not liable to carry out procedures at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs as defined at Point 1 of this Section, shall send written requests to the Exit and Entry Management Department. If they request the granting of visas to guests at international border gates, their written requests must clearly state the border gates and time of the guests? entry, as well as reasons for granting of visas at border gates.

Organizations defined at Points d, e, g and h, Clause 1, Article 4 of the Decree, before carrying out the procedures for inviting and/or guaranteeing foreigners to enter Vietnam, must submit dossiers evidencing their legal person status to the Exit and Entry Management Department. Each dossier comprises:
- Permit or decision of a competent authority on the organization?s establishment;
- Written operation registration of the organization, with certification of the People?s Committee of the province or centrally-run city where the organization is headquartered;
- Written document presenting the seal and signature of the competent person of the organization.

The above-said dossier submission shall be made only once. Any change in dossier content must be notified in writing by the submitting organization to the Exit and Entry Management Department for dossier supplementation.

In conclusion, We just extract some article to show you that we must establish legally under the laws of Vietnam & we have to provide a lot of papers and documents to the Vietnam Immigration Department in order to get approval letter for your visa on arrival at Vietnam International Airports. Therefore we have to charge you a fee that we called service fee in order to prepare papers, documents, send courier to submit your visa applications, queuing to get approval letter and scan to send it to your email, making sure your visa run smoothly on arrival at the airport of Vietnam.
For more details about legal basis of Vietnam visa on arrival at international Airports, Please see for official document from Vietnam government site below:
Ordinance On Entry, Exit And Residence Of Foreigners In Vietnam. Click here

越南签证在越南国际机场的法律依据：
入境，出境和越南的外国人条例（第24/2000 / PL-UBTVQH10，2000年4月28日）于2000年4月28日由Nong Duc Manh先生（越南国民大会主席）批准并签署
第2条
1.越南的机构和组织，越南 - 基于外国机构和组织以及国际组织，越南公民和合法居住在越南的外国人可以邀请外国人进入越南。
2.机构，组织以及个人邀请外国人进入越南必须确其入境目的合法，确保财务事项以及它们与国家机构的合作，以解决外国人出现的问题。
法令第21/2001/ND-CP ，2001年5月28日，出入境和外国人居留在越南条例的实施详情，总理潘文凯认可并签署
第5条

1.机构指定承担在党中央，国民议会，国家总统或政府首脑和部长，副部长，总统或副总统的的同等级别的客人的邀请，接受外国客人到越南的主要责任，人民各省委员会和集中城市，外交部领事部邀请外宾应发邀请的书面通知。外交部领事部应在外国的外交代表团或领事机关在外国的外交代表团或领事馆通知上述邀请的客人，同时通知公安部出入境管理部。外国人进入外交代表团或领事馆、联合国国际组织代表处、越南的政府组织和其亲属陪同人员工作，上述机构应向外交部领事司发出书面通知。外交部领事部在通知并请求外国的越南外交代表团或领事馆申请签证时，应当书面通知公安部出入境管理部。在收到书面通知后2个工作日内，如发现被邀请外国人入境，未获准入境的，公安部出入境管理部门应通知外交部领事部。
2.邀请外国人进入越南的机构、组织和个人，在本条例第1条中未规定的，应当向公安部出入境管理部门发出书面通知或请求。公安部出入境管理部门应通知其批准的越南外交代表团或领事机关，并在收到书面通知后5个工作日内给予外国人签证。如果发现被邀请的外国人尚未获准入境落案，公安部出入境管理部门应当通知邀请机构，组织或者个人。

It is the policy of vietnamvisavoa.com to protect and preserve the privacy of its users and customers, and the confidentiality of the information they provide, subject to conditions described below. To demonstrate our commitment to privacy we encourage all of our current and prospective users to read this Privacy Statement carefully before using the system.

This privacy statement discloses what information we gather, how we use it, and how to correct or change it. It is our intention to give you as much control as possible over your privacy in regard to your Information. Be assured that we will not disclose personal Information to third parties without your consent. By using our site, you agree to the terms of the Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Statement. vietnamvisvoa.com reserves the right to expand and/or modify this Statement at any time.
1. Security.

vietnamvisavoa.com is committed to providing the highest level of security and privacy. All transactions of user authentication including credit cards processing are conducted using SSL (Secure Socket Layer) technology, supported by your browser, which encrypts all information that is sent to us. Our security certificate has been verified by SiteLock Website Security (USA), using the best commercially available encryption on the Internet. We take every precaution to protect personal information from loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration or destruction by implementing policies and procedures to ensure that personal information is kept only for the purposes for which it has been gathered.
2. Information.

We take measures to ensure that the information you provide is recorded accurately and completely. We provide you with access to your personal information at all times for correcting or modifying that information where appropriate.

a. Information Collected from/about Customers is used exclusively for the purpose of providing better service. It is never released to third parties except when expressly permitted by the customer. Any information you provide is completely confidential and will be protected from unauthorized use. Information required for membership is confidentially kept in our database; other information will be deleted after 15 days.

b. Financial Transactions. Credit card transactions are processed through one of the major third-party credit card processing companies: PayPay.com, OnePay.vn and G2S.Com payment gate. All your information is encrypted and is used only to complete the appropriate transactions. Our database stores your email address as username to login on our system for discount policy.

c. Cookies. vietnamvisavoa.com uses cookies to recognize our clients when they visit our site. That allows us to customize their experience on our web site. You may need to have cookies ""turned on"" or enabled in the browser you use in order to register. But if you choose to disable cookies you still will be able to navigate the site. Cookies do not store any personal information. All the information is entirely confidential and is never sold or seen outside of the company. vietnamimmigration.org may display links or advertisement of /to other sites and companies that may also use cookies. In such cases, vietnamimmigration.org cannot be held responsible for any and all information that these parties collect through the use of cookies. You are hereby advised to familiarize yourself with privacy policies and information sharing standards of these sites as they may be different from vietnamvisavoa’s policies and standards.

d. System information. vietnamvisavoa.com reserves the right to collect and store such information as IP address, browser type or operating system type. All the information is highly confidential and will be used exclusively for system administration purposes. This information helps diagnose problems, monitor traffic and site usage.

e. E-mail. vietnamvisavoa.com uses e-mail to notify our members or clients about changes in the status of their applications, changes in the database, on our web site, or when new services or features are added. As part of the service, vietnamimmigration.org may send e-mails notifications whenever there are special discounts, new products added, or new features developed. You may unsubscribe our news letter at anytime. Our e-mail list is confidential and is never sold or given to third parties.
f. Change or Modify Your Information. You can change or modify your profile at any time by emailing to support@vietnamvisavoa.com. This approach guaranties safety of your information.
3. Disclaimer.

Communication over the Internet as well as applications used to provide services over the Internet are subject to various security risks. In no event shall vietnamimmigration.org be responsible for any damages or losses whatsoever, direct or indirect, incidental or consequential, special or punitive, arising from or relating to the unauthorized use, change, deletion or exposure of any information, confidential or not, resulting from unauthorized breaking into the system or any other breach of security, or system failure. Vietnamvisavoa.com hereby disclaims all warranties with regard to the hardware and software used to provide security and support this web site including all implied warranties, fitness for a particular purpose and incidental, special, direct or consequential damages. Accordingly, vietnamimmigration.org, its officers and employees, partners, affiliates, subsidiaries, successors and assigns, and its third-party agents shall not, directly or indirectly, be liable, in any way, to you or any other person for any inaccuracies, misuse, errors, third party interceptions, viruses, or hacker attacks resulting in loss of data or services including, but not limited to errors or interruptions in the transmission or delivery of services. vietnamvisavoa.com contains links to other sites. These links are provided exclusively for information purposes and to assist in locating other Internet resources. Therefore, we are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such web sites.
4. Summary

By accessing this site and using its services, you unconditionally agree with the terms of this Privacy Statement and our Terms & Conditions. You agree to comply with the terms that govern the use of this site and its services and that also govern all information provided by you and other users of vietnamvisavoa.com

本隐私声明透露了我们收集的信息，我们如何使用它，以及如何纠正或改变它。我们打算给你最大程度地控制关于您的隐私信息。请放心，未经您的同意我们不会向第三方披露您的个人信息。通过使用我们的网站，即是您同意了我们的隐私声明的条款。vietnamvisvoa.com保留增加和/或随时修改本声明的权利。
1.  安全

vietnamvisavoa.com致力于提供安全和隐私的最高水平。用户所有的交易需要身份验证，包括信用卡处理使用SSL（安全套接字层）技术，您的浏览器支持，所有的加密信息会发送给我们。我们的安全证书已被SiteLock网站安全（USA）验证，是使用了互联网上最好的商用加密。我们通过实施政策和程序采取了一切预防措施，以防止丢失，滥用，未经授权的访问，泄露，更改或销毁个人信息，为了我们已经收集的宗旨，确保个人信息保留。
2.  信息
我们好采取措施确保您所提供的信息准确、完整地记录下来。我们使用您提供的个人信息，在适当的情况下我们可以随时校正或修改这些信息。
a.客户的信息收集只是用于提供更好的服务目的，这是不会给第三方发行的除非由客户明确允许。您提供的信息是完全保密的，未经授权使用将受到保护。入会所需的信息是机密保存在我们的数据库中，其他信息将在15天后被删除。
b.金融交易，信用卡交易是通过主要的第三方信用卡处理公司中其中一个处理的：PayPay.com，OnePay.vn和G2S。COM支付，您的所有信息是加密的，并仅仅用于完成相应的交易。我们的数据库中存储的电子邮件地址，是作为用户名登录到我们的贴现政策系统的。

c. Cookies，vietnamvisavoa.com使用cookies来辨识我们的客户，当他们访问我们的网站时。这使我们能够自定义他们对我们网站的体验。您可能需要有cookies“打开”，或者你为了注册使用浏览器激活。但是，如果你选择禁用cookies，您仍然可以浏览网站。cookies不存储任何个人信息。所有的信息是完全保密的，并且永远不会出售或给公司外部的人看到。vietnamimmigration.org可能显示其他网站和公司的链接或广告，他们也可能使用cookies。在这种情况下，vietnamimmigration.org不承担任何责任，这些网站和公司通过各方面收集使用cookies的所有信息。您特此被建议熟悉这些网站的隐私政策和信息共享标准，因为他们可能不同于vietnamvisavoa的政策和标准。
d.系统信息，vietnamvisavoa.com保留收集和储存如IP地址，浏览器类型或操作系统类型这些信息的权利。所有的信息是高度机密的，是为系统管理者独占使用的。这些信息有助于诊断问题，监控流量和网站使用情况。
e.电子邮件，vietnamvisavoa.com使用电子邮件来通知我们的会员或客户关于他们在我们的网站上的申请状态变化，数据库变化，或添加新服务或功能。作为服务的一部分，每当有特价，新产品增加，或开发新的功能vietnamimmigration.org可发送电子邮件通知。您可以随时取消订阅我们的信息。我们的电子邮件名单是保密的，并且永远不会出售或提供给第三方。
f. 更改或修改您的信息。您可以随时更改或发送电子邮件至support@vietnamvisavoa.com修改您的个人资料。这种方法可以保证您的信息安全。
3.  免责声明

通过因特网通信以及用于提供服务的应用程序受到各种安全风险，在任何情况下，vietnamimmigration.org负责任何损害或损失，任何直接或间接的，偶然或必然的，特殊或惩罚性的，发生涉及到未经授权使用，变更，删除或任何信息的曝光，保密与否，未经授权闯入系统或任何其他违反安全的行为，或系统故障导致的。Vietnamvisavoa.com特此声明对用于提供安全和支持这个网站的包括所有的暗示担保，适合特定目的和偶然的，特殊的，直接或间接损害的硬件和软件的所有保证。因此，vietnamimmigration.org网站的管理人员和员工，合作伙伴，关联公司，子公司，继承人和受让人，其第三方代理不得以任何方式直接或间接对您或任何其他人的任何失误，滥用，错误，第三方拦截，病毒，或造成数据或服务的损失包括黑客攻击承担赔偿责任，但不限于错误或间断的传输服务。vietnamvisavoa.com包含其他网站的链接。这些链接仅供信息用途和协助定位其他的互联网资源参考。因此，我们不负责此类网站的隐私惯例或内容。
4.  总结
通过访问本网站及使用其服务，你无条件同意本隐私声明以及我们的条款和条件。您同意遵守支配使用本网站的条款，和它的服务也管理着你和vietnamvisavoa.com的其他用户提供的所有信息。

处理时间由www.vietnamvisavoa.com引用的签证和护照都是相似的，在正常情况下根据处理时间提供给领事馆和外交部。处理时间应是在你通过www.vietnamvisavoa.com网上提交申请后的下一个工作如计算的。越南入境事务处可要求额外的文件，而且可能延误和/或拒绝自行决定处理而无需进一步的解释。www.vietnamvisavoa.com对由于拒绝或延迟处理造成的任何延误，取消，金融和其他损失将不承担任何责任。由于延迟或拒绝服务或者任何一部分都将退款或无服务费。
费用和付款

您同意您的信用卡或您的付款账户在网上验证通过之后能立即付账，您同意支付www.vietnamvisavoa.com上任何出售的产品和服务或者通过www.vietnamvisavoa.com出售的任何其他供应商和服务提供商的产品的所有费用。您应支付关于购买任何其他的产品和服务的所有合理的税金和运费。关于机场处理您的越南落地签证的要求和费用，越南过境签和越南使馆签证如有变更，包括但不局限于，申请表格和文档，签证签发所需的印章费，这些如有更改，恕不另行通知。
服务说明

www.vietnamvisavoa.com会可能正确描述网站上的所有服务。然而，它并不保证所有的声明，定义和描述都是最新的，无争议的，准确无误的。越南入境事务处的要求和费用经常变化是没有预先通知的，变化可以立即生效。在任何情况下，任何服务说明或我们网站上的任何信息变得过时或不正确了，你同意保存着www.vietnamvisavoa是无害的。你保存www.vietnamvisavoa.com，所有不准确之处或服务描述，价格，处理时间，处理日期，以及网站上提供的其他信息的错误等不会负任何责任。
服务

有关抵达越南落地签证，越南过境签，越南使馆签证的处理要求和费用，如有更改恕不另行通知。申请表格及签证发放的附加文件如有变更，恕不另行通知。越南入境事务处可酌情要求提供额外文件。他们也可能拒绝抵达时的签证批准，而无需透露拒绝的理由。处理时间由www.vietnamvisavoa.com引用的签证和护照在正常情况下都是相似的，而且在大多数情况下被认为是可靠的，但不完全保证。由于拒绝或延迟处理而造成的任何延误，取消，金融和其他损失我们将不承担任何责任。我们保留以任何理由拒绝处理的权利，包括但不局限于文件不全，处理时间不足，或异常情况。
政策
请您注意我们的隐私声明，其中你也要同意使用本网站时的约束。隐私声明是本协议的一部分。
沟通
通过使用本网站和我们的服务，你在www.vietnamvisavoa.com上的各种目的，它都明确允许通过邮件，信息，或其他电子或非电子的沟通形式联系你，包括市场营销和分销，在任何时候你都能取消订阅。关于您的签证状态的所有更新都通过电子邮件发送给你，可能只在紧急情况下不可能通过电子邮件联系会通过电话打电话给你。
安全
提交注册和申请表格，即表示您确认所提供的信息真实无误，并且您允许我们使用您的个人信息提交到越南入境事务处获得你的越南签证批准函。如果您发送不正确或虚假的护照给我们引起的任何麻烦和问题我们将不负责任。请参考我们的管理提交与分布式信息的隐私声明。
知识产权

这个网站上，包括但不限于文字，内容，照片，图形，软件应用，是当做一个集体工作通过版权，商标，服务标记，国际条约和/或其他所有权和越南等国的法律来保护的。所有标识，图像，网站设计，文本，图形，软件，用于生成www.vietnamimmigration.org网页的HTML代码，是www.vietnamvisavoa.com的唯一财产，不能被复制，改编，勾勒，上色，或以其他任何方式复制而又没有事先通过书面形式得到www.vietnamimmigration.org允许，所有其他服务商标，商标，名称或标志，个别文章，专栏和其他元素均是其各自所有者的财产。 Vietnamvisavoa.com不负责其他服务商标，商标，名称或标识，文章，专栏，和其他元素，可能受版权保护，或可能是其各自所有者的商标和/或服务标志。
版权和商标承诺
www.vietnamvisavoa.com采取一切必要手段，以确保遵守和尊重他人的知识产权。您特此同意www.vietnamvisavoa.com任何实际或涉嫌知识产权侵权引起的一切责任和义务，一经发现并同意以书面形式立即通知我们任何实际或可能侵权。你也同意让我们有足够的时间在采取任何法律行动之前调查和回应任何此类侵害或指控。
赔偿

您应保持不做有损于www.vietnamvisavoa.com的事，并且要保卫自己，其管理人员，董事，代理人和员工如因违反本条款和条件的所有的诉讼，请求，需求和任何性质的责任，包括成本和违反行为产生的费用，你的员工，代理商，分销商，或使用你电脑ID的人，赔偿费用自理。这一要求应扩展到任何第三方产生的为任一原因使用任何专利或版权信息索赔或承担责任。您同意支付任何及所有费用，损失及开支，包括但不限于欠下由产生的任何有关联的索赔，诉讼或法律行动或法律程序引起的合理的律师费和诉讼费债务。
终止
您同意www.vietnamvisavoa.com有权终止您在任何时间访问此网站，恕不另行通知，无论如何，你不会要我们负责或承担任何索赔。我们保留以任何理由拒绝处理文件的权利，包括但不限于文档不全，处理时间不足或异常情况。
链接
本网站包含第三方网站的链接。这些链接仅供参考，是协助互联网资源定位的，对任何链接到我们网站的第三方网站或包含在链接网站的任何链接的内容，信息的准确性，表达意见或声明我们是不负责的。
禁忌

本网站旨在共超过18岁的成年人使用。它不能用于任何非法用途，或与这些条款不符的任何方式。您不得以除了其预期目的之外的其他任何方法使用本网站。如果您提交任何信息给我们了，您同意不张扬或发送传销或连锁信，病毒或其他有害成分，任何侵犯版权或知识产权的任何个人或团体，包括但不限于版权和商标，任何诽谤，侮辱，毁坏名声的，非法，淫秽，威胁，骚扰，欺诈，色情，有害的，或可能构成或助长被视为犯罪行为，引发民事责任，或以其他方式违反任何法律。www.vietnamvisavoa.com不事先书面同意，您不得复制，转载，重新编译，反编译，反向工程，分发，出版，展示，执行，修改，上传，创作衍生作品，不得再循环，传送或以任何方式利用本网站的任何部分，图像和其他材料或提供销售服务，或分支的任何部分。
免责声明

提供给这个网站上的所有信息要“按原样”提供，关于准确性或信息的完整，适合特定用途或目的，包括对适销性，标题，非侵权或其他担保，无明示或暗示的担保。在任何情况下，不论任何索赔或损失www.vietnamvisavoa.com都会负责的，直接的或间接的，偶然或必然的，特殊或处罚的，产生的或使用中的或无法使用网站www.vietnamimmigration.org的特此声明所有的担保，考虑到支持这网站的硬件和软件包含默示的担保，适合特定目的和意外的，特殊的，直接的或间接的损害。于是，www.vietnamvisavoa.com它的管理人员和员工，合作伙伴们，关联公司，子公司，继承人和受让人，和其第三方代理不会以任何方式直接或间接的负责，对您或任何其他人，包含任何不准确或错误或遗漏的服务，但不局限于延迟，错误或任何理由不履行而产生的传输服务中断，产品丢失或损坏。www.vietnamvisavoa.com不作任何形式的担保或表示，对于信息的要求，限制，质量，内容，题材，风格和表达方式直接或通过任何第三方本网站提供的。
完整协议
本协议与隐私声明构成了您与www.vietnamimmigration.org之间的全部协议，并且取而代之的是，任何以及有关www.vietnamimmigration.org所有先前的协议，陈述或申述之间的全部协议。未执行本协议的任何规定不得解释为放弃强制执行该条款的权利等规定。不放弃执行，修正或其他您所作的修改均属无效，除非以书面形式并经双方签字。本协议受越南法律的管辖。

column1: 8222,"[:en]CANCELLATION & REFUND POLICY[:vi]Cancellation & refund policy [:zh]取消及退款政策[:]","[:en]

column2: We guarantee to give clients the pre-approval letter within 2 working days, so applications will be processed as soon as completed. If for any reasons you wish to cancel your visa request at www.vietnamvisavoa.com before the order is being processed, you can do so without any penalties or charges by emailing to support@vietnamvisavoa.com. You will receive a full refund of any fees paid for this particular service. However, no refunds will be given after your visa request is being submitted to Vietnam Immigration Department.

In case of denied applications without changes or changes are made in appropriate time, we will refund clients 100%, with errors made by client, we will not take any responsibilities for this lost; with our company's errors, we will refund 100% fee or arrange the new one correctly.

This visa is applicable to air travel only, so by applying through our website, you agree that you will fly to Vietnam in order to get your visa stamped at Vietnam Airport. We will not refund in case you DO NOT enter Vietnam by air once your visa is approved.
We reserve the right to modify these refund policy without prior notice.
For cancellation or refund request, please email to support@vietnamvisavoa.com
• Cancellation

column1: We guarantee to give clients the pre-approval letter within 24 - 48 hours, so applications will be processed as soon as completed. If for any reason you wish to cancel a service before your passport and other supporting documents were received by http://vietnamvisavoa.com/ you can do so without any penalties or charges using Cancel/Delete function in your account when logged in or by email to support@vietnamvisavoa.com. You will receive a full refund of any fees paid for this particular service and for return shipping (if prepaid). However, no refund will be given after you receive approval letter for your visa from Vietnam Immigration Department.

column2: • Refund Policy

column1: In case of denied applications without changes or changes are made in appropriate time, refund will be as:

- With errors made by client and request to arrange a new correct one, we will charge as follow : 1 month single entry visa (VOA) will be requested again for free; charge extra 50% for arrange new approval letter 3 month visa on arrival, and charge extra 80% fee to request again for new approval letter of Vietnam transit visa and Vietnam embassy visa.
- With our company's errors, we will refund 100% fee or arrange the new one correctly.

- For clients unable to use the approved letter for Vietnam visa because of objective reasons such as accident, disease, natural disasters, etc., the refund will be 50% fee or another application is free.

http://vietnamvisavoa.com/ cannot process refunds for Credit Card payments over 6 months old. Credit cannot be applied to applications submitted through other agencies or applications submitted to Consulates directly.
We reserve the right to modify these refund policy without prior notice.
For cancellation or refund request, please email to support@vietnamvisavoa.com[:zh]

column2: 我们保证在2个工作日内给客户通知书，所以申请书将尽快完成处理。如果由于某种原因你想在处理订单之前取消www.vietnamvisavoa.com的签证申请，你可以通过电子邮件发给support@vietnamvisavoa.com而不用任何罚款或收费。您将收到一个为这个特定服务支付的全额退款。但是，您的签证申请被提交到越南入境事务处后，将不退还任何费用。
此签证只适用于航空旅行，所以通过我们网站申请的话，即是你将飞往越南，以便在越南机场拿到签证。如果你的签证被批准了，而你又不是乘飞机前往越南的，我们将不退还费用。
我们保留修改退款政策的权利，恕不另行通知。对于取消签证或退款的要求，请发邮件至support@vietnamvisavoa.com

column1: 8227,"[:en]How to apply for Vietnam visa on arrival?[:vi]How to apply for Vietnam visa on arrival ?[:zh]如何申请越南落地签？[:]","[:en]

column2: Getting a Vietnam visa in general becomes so much simple and getting Vietnam visa on arrival is especially so easy for those who are traveling by air to Vietnam. It is even more simple and faster for you to get your Vietnam visa online with us at  http://vietnamvisavoa.com.
1. How to apply for Vietnam visa on arrival ?
You just need to follow 4 simple steps as below:
Step 1: Fill out your Vietnam visa application form online at: http://vietnamvisavoa.com/apply-online/
Step 2: Choose payment method that is best convenient for you and pay for service fee.
Step 3: Check your email inbox to receive the Vietnam visa approval letter within 01 working day for urgent service or 02 working days for normal service.

Step 4: Take along with you the Vietnam visa approval letter to get on plane, when you reach your destinated Vietnam airport, present this letter, pay for stamping fee  in cash and get your Vietnam visa stamped on your passport.
2. Important note:

Type of visa: In the first step, you need to choose the most suitable type of visa for your purpose. A single entry Vietnam visa on arrival allows you to enter Vietnam only once during your visa validity, a multiple visa gives you permission for entering and exitting Vietnam as many times as you wish while your visa is still valid.

Entry date: It is the estimated date of your arrival and exit date is understood in the same way. Remember that you can not enter Vietnam before the entry date printed on your visa letter and you may not want to get trouble when trying to exit Vietnam after the expiration date.
Purpose of visit: For visa on arrival, you only could choose tourist or business visa. If you wish to get other different visa types, you are recommended to apply at Vietnam Embassy/Consulate
Personal detail: Please note down exactly the same information as in your passport.
What must be shown at Vietnam Airport:
+ Vietnamese visa approval letter
+ Vietnamese visa application form filled with your personal information with one passport sized photo.
+ Stamping fee in cash in USD ($25 for single entry and $50 for multiple entries)
Still having questions about how to apply for Vietnam visa on arrival ? Contact our support team via email support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84969255515 at any time!
Apply for Vietnam visa on arrival now to visit beautiful Vietnam!
How to apply for your Vietnam visa on arrival?

Procedure for getting a Vietnam visa on arrival at the present is more and more simple for those who are traveling by air to Vietnam. It is even easier and faster for you to obtain your visa online with us. Please look at the four steps below:
Step 1: Fill out your Vietnam visa application form
Step 2: Choose payment method and pay for service fee
Step 3: Check your email inbox to receive the approval letter within 01 working day (or the maximum time is 02 working days).
Step 4: Take along with you the visa letter to airports, when you reach your designated Vietnam airport, present this letter, pay stamping fee and get your Vietnam visa stamped on your passport.
Important note:
<li>

column3: In the first step, you need to choose the most suitable type of visa for your purpose. A single entry Vietnam visa on arrival allows you to enter Vietnam only once during your visa validity whereas a multiple visa gives you permission to visit and exit Vietnam as many times as you wish within the validity of your visa.

column2: <li>

column3: Entry date is the estimated date of your arrival and exit date is understood the same way. Remember that you can not enter Vietnam before the entry date printed on your visa and you may not want to get trouble when trying to exit Vietnam after the exit date.

column2: <li>

column3: Purpose of visit is not so important to consider because you can enter Vietnam with your visa whether you choose business or tourist purpose.

column2: <li>

column3: For personal details, please enter exactly the same information as in your passport.

column2: <li>

column3: There are 4 main payment methods for you to choose: PayPal, Credit Card, Western Union and Bank Transfer, please choose the most convenient one for you and make payment for service fee.

column2: <li>

column3: After your payment is received, all you have to do is waiting for your approval letter. Within 01 working day (or 02 working days at the latest), your approval letter will be ready in your inbox in the email so that you can print it out. To save time at the airport, you can download the Vietnamese visa application form, fill out all the information in advance and glue your passport photo on the form. Once you have your Vietnam visa approval letter in hand, you can easily get on your plane and fly to Vietnam.

column2: <li>

column3: When reaching your arrival Vietnam airport, please come to the Visa upon arrival area, show your passport and two passport-sized photos, filled Vietnamese visa application form and stamping fee in cash in USD ($25 for single entry and $50 for multiple entries).  Finally, the immigration officer will stamp a visa on your passport.

column2: 如何申请越南落地签？
目前，对于那些坐飞机到越南旅行的人来说，落地签证的手续越来越简单了。在线获得落地签也变得更容易和更快捷。请看看下面的四个步骤:
第一步：填写你的落地签申请表
第二步：选择支付方式和支付服务费
第三步：在24小时以内检查你接收批准函的电子邮箱（或最迟48小时）
第四步：带上你的签证批准函，到达越南指定的机场，出示批准函，支付印章费，就可以拿到加盖在您的护照上的越南签证。
重要提示：

在第一步，你需要选择适合你的签证类型。越南签证的单次进入是允许你在你的签证有效期内只能进入一次，多次往返的签证允许你在签证有效期内多次进出越南。记住，你不能在你签证上面的入境日期前进入越南，你也不想在出境日期之后出境制造麻烦。访问的目的不是那么重要,因为你的签证无论是公务或者旅游都可以进入越南。个人信息一栏,请正确输入你护照上面的信息。输入所有必需的信息,然后单击Next之后,您将自动转移到步骤2付款。有4个主要可供您选择的支付方式: Paypal、信用卡,西联汇款和银行转账,请选择最方便的一个支付服务费。收到你的支付后,你所需要做的就是等待你的批准函，在24个工作小时内(或最迟48工作时间),你的批准函就可以发送到你的电子邮箱,这样您就可以打印出来了。为了在机场节省时间,你可以下载越南签证申请表,提前填写所有信息和用胶水在表格里贴上护照照片。一旦你拿到你的越南签证批准函,你可以很容易地乘坐航班飞到越南。当你到达越南机场时，请到入境签证处，出示您的护照和2张护照大小的照片，填写越南签证申请表，并用美元现金支付费用（一个月单次是25美金，一个月多次是50美金）最后，移民官会在你的护照上加盖签证。

column1: 8229,"[:en]What is Vietnam visa on arrival?[:vi]What is VOA ?[:zh]什么是越南落地签证？[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Vietnam visa on arrival is a type of visa  that you can pick up at Vietnam international airports and you can only obtain it if you enter this country by air. In other words, Vietnam visa on arrival is the visa which is applied for those who travel to Vietnam by air only. However, please do keep in mind that, you must submit a visa request online first in order to take a visa approval letter issued by Vietnam Immigration. You will be able to take your flight to Vietnam with this document and then collect your stamped visa at Vietnam Airport.
Application form for Vietnam visa on arrival.

When you arrive in Vietnam at any Vietnam International airports, you can get the visa stamped onto your passport at Visa upon arrival area by submitting the approval letter together with your passport (at least 6 months validity), two passport-sized photos (which must be taken within six months), and stamping fee in USD ( in cash). Once a visa is stamped on your passport, you will be ready to pass over the check-in area and enter Vietnam. This must be the most convenient way for you to get Vietnam visa.

To prevent you from getting into troubles when apply for Vietnam visa on arrival, we have listed some common mistakes that so many travelers usually make. We truly hope everything will be easier for you after you have a look at the 5 common mistakes as below:

1 - Getting visa on arrival without applying online: The reality is that many travelers believe they can get a Vietnam visa directly at the airports in Vietnam without having to apply online for getting approval letter. Please bare in mind that it is Vietnam visa on arrival which is not the same as Thailand or Cambodia visa on arrival . You may be ended up with the delaying or cancelling of your flights or you have to wait at the airport until the visa is approved. Therefore we strongly suggest that you should apply online for your approval letter at our website so that you can pick up your visa at Vietnam International airports when you arrive.

2 - Get visa on arrival at the border: We would like to stress the point that Visa on arrival is only applicable for those who travel by air. In other words, there will be no visa on arrival at the border. So if you travel by any other kinds of transportation, you must get your visa done at Vietnam Embassy/Consulate.

3 - Spelling or Typo mistakes: Many applicants fill in the Application form with WRONG details: passport full name, passport number or date of birth. Normally, no serious problems come from this. However, you might get trouble at the departure airport if the information on your approval letter does not match those in your passport. Therefore, entering every detail correctly and carefully is the best way since it not only take you just a little time but also prevent you from getting unexpected problems.

4 - Arrival date: Perhaps you as well as so many other travelers think that the visa validity starts from the date a traveler enters Vietnam, not the arrival date  that he or she provides in the visa request. However, it is not true. Your visa validity commences from the date you register when you submit your visa request, not the date you physically enter Vietnam.

5 - Visa extension: Most travelers have the belief that it is easy to extend a visa so they don’t pay much attention about which kind of visa they must choose. For example, in case they are not sure about how long they will stay in Vietnam, they can apply for a 1 month visa first, after that they can extend their visa if  they want to stay in Vietnam longer. However, please note that it is not as easy as you think it is supposed to be. In fact, extending a visa may be costly and time-consuming. So, if possible, just apply for a 3 month visa in advance instead of applying for a 1 month one so that you can save your money and time on visa extension.
For further information about procedure to apply for Vietnam visa on arrival, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.941279289
Apply Vietnam visa on arrival now!
What is Vietnam visa on arrival?

It is a visa you can pick up at one of three Vietnam international airports (Noi Bai, Tan Son Nhat or Da Nang international airport) and you can only obtain it if you enter this country by air. More specifically, Vietnam Visa on arrival is the visa which is applied for those who travel to Vietnam by air only. When you arrive in Vietnam at any Vietnam International airport, you can get the visa stamped onto your passport at the Immigration check-in by submitting the approval letter together with your passport (6 months validity), two passport-sized photos (which must be taken within six months to reflect your current appearance), and stamping fee (you must pay this fee in cash). And finally, you will be ready to pass over the check-in door and enter Vietnam. It may well be the quickest and cheapest way to get your Vietnam visa; To prevent you from getting troubles when apply for Vietnam visa on arrival, we have listed some common mistakes that so many travelers usually make. We truly hope everything will be easier for you after you have a look at the 5 common mistakes as below:

1 -Getting visa on arrival without applying online: the reality is that many travelers believe they can get a Vietnam visa directly at the airports in Vietnam without having to apply online for getting approval letter. No good can come from this since it is not true at all. You may be ended up with the delaying or cancelling of your flights or you have to wait at the airport until the visa is approved. Therefore we strongly suggest that you should apply online for your approval letter at our website so that you can pick up your visa at one of three main Vietnam international airports ( Tan Son Nhat airport, Noi Bai airport, Da Nang airport).

2 – Get visa on arrival at the border: we would like to stress the point that Visa on arrival is only applicable for those who travel by air. In other words, there will be no visa on arrival at the border. So if you travel by any other kinds of transportation, you can’t get visa on arrival. In case you don’t enter Vietnam by air, contact us in advance to ask for procedure of getting a visa by land.

3 – Spelling or Typo mistakes: many applicants fill in the Application form with WRONG details: passport full name, passport number or date of birth. Normally, no serious problems come from this. However, you might get trouble at the departure airport if the information on your approval letter doesn’t match those in your passport. Therefore, entering everything correctly and carefully is the best way since it not only take you just a little time but also prevent you from getting unexpected problems.

4 - Arrival date: perhaps you as well as so many other travelers think that the visa validity starts from the date a traveler enters Vietnam, not the date he or she provides. However, it is not true at all. Please note that your visa validity commences from the date you provided earlier, not the date you will enter Vietnam. We highly suggest that you should make a clear plan about the date you will enter Vietnam before deciding to order a visa to Vietnam for your convenience.

5 - Visa extension: most travelers have the belief that it is easy to extend a visa so they don’t pay much attention about which kind of visa they must choose. For example, in case they are not sure about how long they will stay in Vietnam, they can apply for a 1 month visa first, after that they can extend their visa if  they have to stay in Vietnam more than that period (as they think extending visa process is simple and fast). However, please note that it is not as easy as you think it is supposed to be. In fact, extending a visa may be costly and time-consuming. So, if possible, just apply for a 3 month visa in advance instead of applying for a 1 month one so that you can save your money and time on visa extension.
越南落地签证是一种你能在越南国际机场拿到的签证类型，并且你只能乘飞机进入该国才能拿到它。换句话说，越南落地签证是适用于那些只乘坐飞机到越南的旅游签证。但是，请记住，您必须首先在网上提交签证申请，以便拿到越南移民局签发的签证批准函。你将要待着你的文件飞到越南，然后在越南机场加盖你的签证。
当您到达越南的任一国际机场时，您可以通过到达区提交批准函和您的护照（至少6个月有效期）与加盖在您护照上的签证，两张护照尺寸的照片（必须是六个月以内的）和印章费用美元（现金）。一旦你的护照上的签证盖了章，你将准备通过检查去进入越南，这肯定是你获得越南签证的最方便的方式。
为了避免你办理越南落地签证的麻烦，我们列出了一些许多旅客经常犯的常见的错误，看看下面5个常见的错误之后我们真心希望一切将会更容易：
1-不在网上申请获得落地签证：现实情况是，许多旅客认为他们可以直接在越南机场得到越南签证，而不需要在线申请获得批准函。请注意，这是抵达越南的签证，跟抵达泰国或柬埔寨的签证是不一样的。你可能会因航班延迟或取消而终止行程，或者您在机场等待签证直到获批。因此，我们强烈建议你在我们的网站上在线申请批准函，这样你就可以在到达时在越南国际机场拿到你的签证了。
2-在边境获取落地签证：我们想枪挑的是落地签证只适用于那些乘飞机旅行的人，换句话说，在边境是没有落地签证的。所以，如果你乘坐其他的交通工具，你必须在越南大使馆/领事馆拿到你的签证。
3-拼写错或错别字：许多申请人填写了错误的详细信息申请表：护照全名，护照号码或出生日期。通常情况下，没有什么严重的问题是来源于这个错误的。不过，如果你的批准函上面的信息与你的护照上的信息不一致你可能会在出发机场遇到麻烦。因此，认真并且正确地对照每个细节是最好的方法，它不仅只占用你一点点的时间，而且可以避免你出现意想不到的麻烦。
4-抵达日期：也许你还有其他许多旅客认为，签证有效期是从旅客进入越南开始的，而不是他或她的签证申请提供的抵达日期开始的。然而，这是不正确的。你的签证有效期从您正式提交您的签证申请的日期开始的，而不是你实际进入越南之日开始计算。
5-签证延期：大多数旅客都认为签证是很容易延长的，所以他们不会太注意哪些他们应该选择哪一种签证类型。例如，如果他们不确定他们将在越南停留多久，他们可以申请1个月的签证先，之后，如果他们想停留更久，他们可以延长他们的签证。但是，请注意，它并不像你认为的那样简单。事实上，签证延期可能费用高和费时的。因此，如果可以的话，提前申请3个月的签证，而不是申请1个月的，这样你可以在签证延期上节省时间和金钱。

column1: 8232,"[:en]Who needs Vietnam visa ?[:vi]Ai cần visa Việt Nam ?[:zh]谁需要越南签证？[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Who needs Vietnam visa?

Vietnam visa is an essential governmental certification for foreigners to enter Vietnam. In other words, it is an essential certification issued by the governmental offices of Vietnam, which certified foreigners wish to enter. Visa is usually stamped on passports.
Generally speaking, most visitors need a Vietnam visa to enter the country except for some circumstances included in the Vietnam visa exemption list as below:
<li style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: Cambodia, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia and Laos’ passport holders for visits of 30 days at the maximum.

column2: <li style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: Philippines passport holders for visits of 21 days at the maximum.

column2: <li style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: Japan, South Korea, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Russia and Finland passport holders for visits of 15 days at the maximum.

column2: <li style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: Brunei passport holders for visits of 14 days at the maximum.

column2: <li style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC) Holders from Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) member economies for visits of 60 days at the maximum.

column2: <li style=""text-align:justify"">

column3: For those who travel to Phu Quoc Island - Vietnam: Foreigners and Vietnamese holding foreign passports who enter Vietnam through an international border gate to travel to Phu Quoc Island and stay in Phu Quoc within 15 days will also be granted Vietnam visa exemption. Passports must be valid for 45 days at least. After the visitors’ arrival in Phu Quoc Island, if they want to travel to other localities or stay in the island for more than 15 days, they will be granted visas there and then by the Immigration Department.

Who needs Vietnam visa?

Vietnam visa is an essential governmental certification for foreigners to enter Vietnam. In other words, it is an essential certification issued by the governmental offices of Vietnam, which certified foreigners wish to enter. Visa is usually stamped on passports. Generally speaking, most visitors need a Vietnam visa to enter the country except for some circumstances included in the Vietnam visa exemption list as below:
<li>

column3: Cambodia, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia and Laos’ passport holders for visits of 30 days at the maximum.

column2: 谁需要越南签证？
越南签证是一个重要的政府认证，是给外国人进入越南的。
<li>

column3: 柬埔寨，泰国，马来西亚，新加坡，印尼和老挝护照持有者最多可以停留30天。

column2: <li>

column3: 菲律宾护照持有者最多可以停留21天。

column2: <li>

column3: 日本，韩国，瑞典，挪威，丹麦，俄罗斯和芬兰护照持有者最高有15天的停留。

column2: <li>

column3: 文莱护照持有者最多有14天的停留。

column2: <li>

column3: 由亚太经合组织（APEC）体系的成员APEC商务旅行卡（ABTC）可以有最高60天的访问。

column2: <li>

column3: 对于那些前往越南富国岛的旅客，外国人和越南人持外国护照通过国际关闸进入越南前往富国岛旅行并在富国岛停留15天也将被授予越南签证豁免。护照有效期必须至少有45天，访客到达富国岛之后，如果他们想前往其他地区，或留在岛上的时间超过15天，他们将在那里由入境事务处获得签证。

column1: 8234,"[:en]Payment guidance-Vietnamvisavoa.com[:vi]Hướng dẫn thanh toán[:zh]支付指南[:]","[:en]

column2: Here is the payment guidance from Vietnamvisavoa.com:
1.    Service fee: This fee is paid for our company for the arrangement of the Vietnam visa pre-approved letter for picking up your visa-upon-arrival at Vietnam airports.
You could pay by:
A. Settle the payment via PayPal (www.Paypal.Com)

Paypal is the payment gateway by credit card, or by itself, because this is the most popular pocket payment now, and it is allowed many to accept online payments today. This payment gateway accepted Credit/Debit card like Visa Card, Master Card, America Express, Dinner Club and many more.

With this case, you can get approved to precede the Vietnam visa right after you fill the secure form for visa. because it was built right on the website. so it is recommended to use, since PayPal always protect consumers. You can request refunds if they provide no services as required.
Note: You could opt for the money to be delivered in USD.
B. Settle the payment via Western UNION

Western UNION is known for a long time, this is the easiest way of transferring money. The service provider can receive cash in 15-20 minutes after the paying from customers. This is not recommended because it costs much money for transfer service.

If you use Western UNION to pay for Vietnam visa service, please send us your payment receipt along with the money transfers control number (MTCN). We will check with our bank and process your visa request as soon as we are informed that they payment has gone through.
C. Settle the payment via bank transfer Asia Commercial Bank (ACB Bank)

This is the ultimate way to pay for service fee but it is a bit complicated for those who do not know how to use online banking. And often the transfer of this money, will last longer than the above manner. and it is also costly for the transfer money.

After getting the payment request details from us, you can go wire the money from your bank account to our Bank account. And please inform us by email, together with bank transfer receipts so that we can proceed the visa for you on time, avoid losing precious time of your report.
D. Settle the payment direct at office
If you cannot choose any of above methods, you can ask your relative to pay us directly at our office:
Notes:
-  We use USD (US Dollar) as list price for all our services.
- Once your service fee is well received, we will process your visa approval letter which will be ready at our website after one business day (urgent service) or 2 business day (normal service).

2.    Stamping fee: This fee is paid directly to Immigration officer at Visa upon arrival at Vietnam airports when you arrive. You must pay the fee in cash in USD to get stamped visa on your passport.
For any concerns abbout Payment guidance, we are pleased to hear from you. Please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.941279289
Apply Vietnam visa on arrival now!
Your satisfaction, our business!
Best regards,
Vietnamvisavoa.com
1.服务费：此费用支付给我们公司是为安排越南签证预先批准的信函而使用的，以获取你在到达越南机场时的签证。
你可以通过以下方式支付：
A．通过Paypal支付（www.paypal.com）
Paypal是由信用卡支付网关，或通过它本身付款，因为这是现在最流行的口袋支付，今天已经很多人接受在线支付方式了。这种支付网关接受信用卡/借记卡像VISA卡，万事达卡，美国运通卡，大来卡等等。在这种情况下，在你填写签证安全形式后你可以获得在越南签证的权利批准。因此建议使用网上支付方式，因为Paypal一直保护消费者。如果它们不提供所需的服务，您可以要求退款。
注意：你可以选择使用美元支付。
B．通过西联支付
众所周知西联汇款有很长一段历史了，这是转移资金的最简单的方法。
客户付款后，服务提供商可以收到15-20分钟的现金。这是不提倡的，因为它的传送服务的成本要花太多的钱。如果您使用西联汇款支付越南的签证服务，请向我们提供您的付款收据的转账控制号码（MTCN）。我们会查我们的银行卡，一旦我们知道款到账了，就会尽快处理您的签证申请。
C. 通过银行转账亚洲商业银行（ACB银行）支付
这是支付服务费的最后方式，但它对于那些不知道如何使用网上银行的人来说有点复杂。而往往这种资金的转移，将比上述两点持续更长的时间，它的成本也是昂贵的。从我们这里获得的支付请求详细信息后，您可以从您的银行帐户给我们的银行账户汇款了。并请通过电子邮件与银行汇款收据一起告知我们，使我们可以进行签证给你时间，避免错过你报到的宝贵时间。
D.直接结算付款
如果你不能选择上述几个方法，你可以问你的亲戚直接到我们的办公室支付：
注意：
-我们所有服务的价格是用美元支付的。
-一旦你的服务费是准确的，我们将处理您的签证批准函，我们的网站办理是一个工作日（加急）或2个工作日（正常服务）后。

您的满意是我们的业务！

column1: 8251,"[:en]10 things about Vietnam visa on arrival [:vi]Thủ tục nhập cảnh vào Việt Nam[:zh]你所要知道的越南落地签[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Here is 10 things about Vietnam visa on arrival that you should remember and note down carefully.
1.    What is Vietnam visa on arrival?

This is for you to get stamped visa upon arrival when you fly into Vietnam. You just need to fill in visa application form at our website, pay the service fee to get your "Visa approval letter" issued by Vietnam Immigration department via email within 1 - 2 working days. You take along with you the document to Vietnam International airports (Hanoi, Da Nang, Nha Trang and Ho Chi Minh) and pick up your stamped visa there.
2.    How to get a visa approval letter?
You submit a visa request online at: You then pay to service fee. The visa approval letter will be issued by Vietnam Immigration Department and it will be sent to your email in 1- 2 working days.
3.    What is the “approval letter”?

The "Visa approval letter" is a document which is issued by the Immigration Office. It allows you to enter and exit Vietnam for a given time period. With the approval letter, you can pick up your visa upon arrival at one of the  four international airports in Vietnam (Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh , Nha Trang and Da Nang).
4.    How long does it take to get the approval letter?

Normally, the approval letter is processed and emailed you within one or 2 working days (excluding Saturday, Sunday and National Holiday). In urgent cases, you are able to get the visa letter with several working hours.
Please note that the time frame above is applied for regular cases and for tourist visa. For some other cases, it may take upto a week to collect the document.
5.    How do I receive my visa approval letter?

A colored scanned copy of the approval letter will be sent to you by email, so please make sure that you have provided us with the correct email address. In case you do not receive the visa letter in time, you should contact us right away.
6.    Who can use this visa approval letter?

Visa approval letter is used for those who are flying into Vietnam only so that they could collect stamped visa at Vietnam Airport. The four international airports in Vietnam that you can receive your visa stamp with this approval letter are: Noi Bai International Airport (Hanoi), Tan Son Nhat International Airport (Ho Chi Minh City), Danang Airport (Da Nang) and Cam Ranh Airport ( Nha Trang) . The visa approval letter is NOT VALID for OVERLAND ENTRY
Note: If you plan to enter Vietnam by land or cruise, please visit Vietnamese Embassy / Consulate to get your visa prior to your trip.
7.    What document do I need to apply for Vietnam visa on arrival?

All you need to do is to submit a visa form online with essential information as shown in your passport (full name, nationality, gender, date of birth, passport number, passport expiration date), your arrival date and visa type.
8.    Do I need photos?
Yes, you do. However, photos are required upon arrival Vietnam's airports only, so please remember to bring at least 2 photos of standard passport size.
Note: If you cannot prepare those photos before your departure, you can also get them at a Vietnam airport for 2 USD or so per photo.
9.    What if my passport is going to expire in less than 6 months?

To apply for a visa to Vietnam, your passport must have at least 6 month's validity. Therefore, if your passport is about to expire, please get a new one before applying for your visa in order to avoid unwanted problems at the airport. Practically, if you could manage to fly into Vietnam, there is no issue at Vietnam Airports.
10.     I do not know my exact arrival and exit date, what should I do?

You can take estimation. The arrival date you provide can be earliest date that you plan to arrive and you can arrive after that date.  As for exit date, you could leave Vietnam on any dates before your visa expires.
To get more information about 10 things about Vietnam visa on arrival, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.94 127 92 89.
Apply online now!

column1: [:vi]Thủ tục nhập cảnh vào Việt Nam[:zh]

column2: 1.什么是越南落地签？
当你飞往越南在抵达后为你加盖签证的。你只需要在我们的网站上填写签证申请表，缴纳服务费，在1-2工作日内拿到由越南移民部门通过电子邮件给你发布的“签证批准函”。你拿着这些资料到越南国际机场（河内，岘港，芽庄和胡志明）拿你盖章的签证。
2.如何拿到签证批准函？
你在网上提交签证申请，然后支付服务费，签证批准函将由越南移民部门颁发并且在1-2工作日内发邮件给你。
3.什么是“批准函”？
“签证批准函”是由移民局颁发的文件，它可以让你在一个固定时间内进出越南。有了批准函，你可以在抵达越南四个国际机场（河内，胡志明，芽庄和岘港）中的其中一个机场拿到你的签证。
4.多久能拿到批准函？
一般来说，批准函会在一到两个工作如内处理好并发邮件给你（除了星期六，日以及法定假期），紧急情况下，你可以在几个小时内拿到批准函。请注意上面的时间是适用于正常的旅游签证，对于其他情况，可能需要一周来收集文件。
5.我如何拿到我的批准函？
通过电子邮件会发送给你一张彩色扫描的批准函，所以请确保你提供给我们的是正确的邮件地址。假如你没有及时收到批准函，你要马上联系我们。
6.谁能使用签证批准函？
签证批准函是给那些只飞往越南的人使用的，所以他们能在越南机场加盖签证。越南的四个国际机场可以凭批准函拿到你的签证盖章：内排国际机场（河内），新山一国际机场（胡志明），岘港机场（岘港）和金兰机场（芽庄）。签证批准函对陆路入境是无效的。
注意：如果你打算从陆路或游船进入越南，请在旅行之前访问越南大使馆/领事馆获得签证。
8.我需要照片吗？
是的，你需要照片。但是，照片只是抵达越南机场时才需要，所以请记得带两张标准护照尺寸的照片。
注意：如果你在出发之前不能准备好照片，你也可以在越南机场花2美元让他们拍一张照片。
9.如果我的护照在6个月以内即将到期了怎么办？
申请越南签证，你的护照必须有至少6个月的有效期。因此，如果你的护照差不多到期，为了避免在机场里有不要的麻烦，在申请签证之前换一个新的护照。实际上，如果你能设法飞到越南，在越南机场也是没有任何问题的。
10.我不知道我确切的抵达日期和离开日期，我该怎么办？
你可以估算，您提供的抵达日期可以是您计划抵达的最早日期，并且您能在那日期之后抵达。至于出境日期，您可以在签证到期前的任何日期离开越南。

column1: 8270,"[:en]TERMS AND CONDITIONS[:vi]TERMS AND CONDITIONS[:zh]条款和条件[:]","[:en]

column2: 在这些条款和条件中，“we, our, us”是指VietnamvisaVOA.com
1.接受条款
-请注意，这个网站不是政府网站，只属于关联解决方案的公司，公司是由越南入境事务处批准的。它是在关联的解决方案公司的管理下运营的。
-使用本网站之前，请仔细阅读这些条款和条件。如果您反对本协议的任何一项，你就不能在网站上使用任何产品或服务，并马上关掉网站。
-您得同意不得使用本网站作非法用途，并遵守所有适用的法律和法规。
-您同意不使用本网站的任何会影响性能，损坏内容或降低网站的整体功能的一种方式。
-您也得同意不危及网站的安全性或试图访问安全区域或敏感信息。
-您同意全权负责任何索赔，费用，责任，损失，成本，包括我们任何侵犯本协议的条款和条件而产生的法律费用。
2.修正
www.Vietnamvisavoa.com随时保留更改本协议的任何部分的权利，恕不另行通知，你访问该网站将被视为接受本协议。我们建议用户定期检查本协议的条款和条件。
-我们全权修改或删除本网站的任何部分，而不会产生警告或责任等动作。
3.取消和退款

-越南移民局在所有的越南签证上都没有退款政策，因为他们在工作中收取费用，并不是每一个都授予签证。因此，重要的是，你应该要在www.Vietnamvisavoa.com上取消您的签证申请，还必须立即与我们联系，以防止被产生任何不必要的成本。一旦您的签证申请状态下的“处理”或批准函已经由移民部签发，我们就无法偿还你的签证费。当务之急，在你打算离开的时候，提供给我们申请签证的所有正确的信息。由于不正确的签证信息拒绝入境，www.vietnamvisavoa.com当然不会为签证错误负任何责任。虽然我们将尽一切努力在出发前纠正任何签证问题，在提供虚假或不正确的信息时我们不会给予退款。我们强烈建议您在出发前核对您的护照和个人信息，您的签证通知函。
-该签证适用于航空旅行而已，所以通过我们的网站申请，您是同意将飞往越南以获得您的签证盖章。一旦你的签证被批准而你又不通过飞机进入越南的话，我们将不退款。
4.退款
假如您的申请被移民局拒绝，所有费用将在15天内退还到您的帐户。
5.错误
-移民官员有时会犯错误。我们建议你仔细核对一下这封信的细节。如果您发现文件中有任何错误，请立即通知我们。
-日期格式：dd/mm/yyyy – 12/06/1980
-时区：越南标准时间-北京时间+7
-工作日：除了星期六和星期日以外的所有工作日。但是我们在周末提供特殊服务。
-工作时间：一天24小时，一周7天
-多次/单次进入：Multiple被解释为多次，而不是多个申请者。
-多次进入是指你允许在一个特定时间（1个月或3个月或6个月）内进出越南多次。例如：6个月多次签证指你被允许在随后的几个月里的预期的到达日期进出越南几次。
7.处理时间和完成服务
-Vietnamvisavoa.com提供预先核准函的处理时间是根据越南入境处在正常情况下安排的， 1 - 2个工作日内提供处理时间。处理时间将在你付款和拿到你的付款回执后的下一个工作日开始。越南入境事务处可要求额外的文件，而且可能延误和/或拒绝自行决定处理而无需进一步的解释。
-一旦批准函被发送到您在申请过程中所提交的电子邮件地址，我们提供的服务就完成了。如果你没有及时收到信件您必须通知我们，如果我们在7天内没有收到您通知的邮件，该项服务就被认为是已经完成了。申请人提供错误的邮件地址或申请人不通过邮件通知我们的情况下有任何的延误/丢失而造成批准函没有收到，我们是不负责的。
8.免责声明
-假如你的签证申请被越南移民局拒签，您的机票取消，越南旅游或者的住宿预订的任何延误或损失，我们是不负责的，在这种情况下，我们将退还您向我们支付的全部金额。
-通常情况下，它需要2个工作日处理批准函，但是，也有例外，由于处理过程中不可预见的问题而延误完全取决于越南入境事务处，我们强烈建议您提前至少1个星期办理签证，避免出现任何问题。
-每个应用程序分别发出批准函，然而在某些情况下（在旺季和紧急处理请求），同一时间或到达的同一天申请签证的所有申请者在共享的基础上根据越南入境事务处全权决定发出批准函。
-请注意，我们也有拒绝任何的签证申请的权利。
-如果你有另外的批准函的特殊要求，请通过support@vietnamvisavoa.com给我们发电子邮件。
In these Terms and Conditions “we, our, us” refers to VietnamvisaVOA.com
1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS

- Please note that this website is not the Government website, just belong to the Connection Solution Company,. Ltd was authorized by Immigration Department of Vietnam. It operates under the management of Connection Solution Company., Ltd.

- Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using this website. If you object to any of the terms and conditions set out in this agreement you should not use any of the products or services on the Website and leave immediately.
- You agree that you shall not use the Website for illegal purposes, and will respect all applicable laws and regulations.
- You agree not to use the website in a way that may impair the performance, corrupt the content or otherwise reduce the overall functionality of the Website.
- You (also) agree not to compromise the security of the Website or attempt to gain access to secured areas or sensitive information.

- You agree to be fully responsible for any claim, expense, liability, losses, costs including legal fees incurred by us arising from any infringement of the terms and conditions set out in this agreement.
2. MODIFICATION

www.Vietnam-Evisa.Org reserves the right to change any part of this agreement without notice and you access the site will be considered acceptance of this agreement. We advise users to regularly check the Terms and Conditions of this agreement.
- We have complete discretion to modify or remove any part of this site without warning or liability arising from such action.
3. CANCELLATIONS AND REFUNDS

- The Vietnam Immigration Dept runs a no-refund policy on all Vietnam visas as they charge for work done and not per granted visa, it is therefore important that should you wish to cancel your visa application with www.Vietnam-Evisa.Org that you contact us immediately to prevent any unnecessary cost being incurred. Once your visa application status is put under ""payment received"" or ""under processing"" or an Approval letter has been made by us with the Immigration Dept we are unable to reimburse you the visa fee.

- It is imperative that you supply us with all the correct information required for your requested visa at the time of your intended departure. www.Vietnam-Evisa.Org cannot be held responsible for any visa granted incorrectly or refused entry due to incorrect visa information. Though every effort will be made on our part to correct any visa issues prior to departure, no refund will be given by us in the event of false or incorrect information being supplied at the time of issue. We strongly recommend that you check your visa confirmation letter against your passport and personal information prior to departure.

- This visa is applicable to air travel only, so by applying through our website, you agree that you will fly to Vietnam in order to get your visa stamped. We will not refund in case you DO NOT enter Vietnam by air once your visa is approved.
4. REFUNDS

- All the fees will be refunded to your account in case your application is declined by the Immigration Department. In case your visa application is declined by the Immigration Department, all the paid fees will be refunded to your account.
5. ERRORS

- Immigration officers sometimes make mistakes. We suggest that you check the details on the approval letter carefully. If you find any errors on the letter of approval, please inform us immediately by EMAIL. If we do not receive any email for error correction within 7 days from the time we send out the letter of approval, we will not be responsible for any failed applications, declined entries or losses.
6. VOCABULARY
- Date format: dd/mm/yyyy - 12th June 1980
- Time Zone: Vietnam standard time - GMT +7
- Working days: All week days except Saturday and Sunday. But we know how to get visa for you on Sat and Sun.
- Working hours: 24/7 everyday.
- Multiple / Single entry: Multiple is interpreted as multiple entries, not multiple applicants.

- Multiple entries means you are allowed to enter / exit Vietnam multiple times within a given period of time (1, 3 or 6 months). For example: 6 month multiple entry visa means you are allowed to enter / exit Vietnam several times from the intended date of arrival provided plus 6 calendar consecutive months.
7. PROCESSING TIME AND SERVICE COMPLETION

- Processing time for arranging pre-approved letter offered by Vietnam-Evisa.Org is based on processing time provided by Vietnam Immigration Department under normal circumstances, which are 2 – 3 working days. Processing time will be starting from the next business day after you pay and notify us your payment receipt. Vietnam Immigration Department may request additional documents and may delay and/or deny processing at their discretion without further explanations.

- Our service provided is completed once the letter of approval is sent to the email address you submitted during the application process. You are required to notify us if you do not receive the letter in time, if no email from you informing us that you do not receive the letter within 7 days, the service is understood to be completed. We are not responsible for any delay/loss caused by the Wrong email addresses supplied by applicants or the situation that applicants do not notify us by email that approval letter is not received.
8. DISCLAIMERS

- We are not responsible for any loss, delay or cancellation of your flight ticket, tour or accommodation booking made for your trip to Vietnam in case your visa application is declined by the Immigration Department of Vietnam. In this case, we will refund you the full amount paid to us.

- Normally, it takes 2 working days to process an approval letter, however, there are also exceptions, and delay due to unforeseen problems since the process is highly dependent on the Immigration Department of Vietnam. We strongly recommend that you apply for a visa at least 1-2 weeks in advance to avoid any problems.

- The letter of approval is issued separately for each application, however, in some cases (During high seasons and urgent processing requests), it is issued on a shared basis for all applicants who apply for a visa at the same time or same date of arrival based on the Immigration Department sole decision.
- Please note that we also reserve the right to refuse to any visa requests.
- Please email us via visavoamail@gmail.com if you have special request for separate letter of approval.

column1: 8274,"[:en]Ha Long Bay- No.1 tourist attraction in Vietnam[:vi]Vịnh Hạ Long[:zh]下龙湾[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Ha Long Bay- No.1 tourist attraction in Vietnam, located in the Gulf of Tonkin, within Quang Ninh Province, in the northeast of Vietnam, is165 km from the capital of Ha Noi.

Ha Long Bay is recognized as the world heritage by the UNESCO. It is dotted with jagged limestone pinnacles, is at the first top for Vietnam’s biggest destination. Ha Long Bay includes many places for visiting. Here are the lists of top places that you should consider when visiting Ha Long Bay.
1. Enjoying the views on Ha Long Bay Cruise

It must be the most interesting things when everyone can stay on a cruise and observe Ha Long Bay at night ad at dawn. It is the most impressive way to experience this spectacular view, a natural world’s heritage. You also can enjoy with cruise party, do Tai Chi on desk and relax under the amazing landscape and even sunbathe or go swimming in a boat.
2. Sung Sot Cave (Amazing Cave)

It is the largest cave in Ha Long Bay. There are two chambers in the cave with a square-shaped outer chamber and a ceiling about 30 meters high. The inner chamber formations look like sentries conversing with one another and another formation. The cave with granite pavements and colored lighting beautification will make tourists experience great things in the special cave.
3. Ti Top island

It is located in the heart of Ha Long Bay, which is 8 kilometers from the Southeast of Bai Chay harbor. It is one of the most attractive sites for both international and domestic tourists to Ha Long. It is special because it owns breathtaking romantic landscape and a heavenly beautiful beach with fresh atmosphere, clean water, and smooth white sand, which creates a great ambiance for tourists to relax.
4. Bai Tu Long Bay

This bay has pristine natural landscape with extensive unexplored area. This bay has many attractions to visit such as Vung Vieng fishing village, Cong Dam area, Thien Canh Son cave etc.  this bay also has the national park that is rich in biological diversity and home to many different flora and fauna.
5. Dau Go Cave

It is amongst the most famous tourist attractions in Ha Long Bay. The cave entrance is a fellyfish look –alike 90 steps stair. Into the cave, a massive system of stalagmites and stalactites resembles stony waterfalls.

Đầu Gỗ Cave is proudly listed in the world famous tourism book Merveille de Monde published in France in 1938, which presents the most beautiful and worth visiting tourist attractions in the world, including Đầu Gỗ Cave under the name “Grotte des marveilles” (Cave of Wonders).
6. Thien Cung Cave

Thien Cung Cave or Heavenly Palace Cave is located in the southwest of Ha Long Bay. It is the ost beautiful primitive cave of the Bay. It becomes famous with its unique system of stalactites and stalagmites with different forms and shapes.
7. Hon Ga Choi island (Kissing Rocks)

This island is appeared in poetry, among thousands of islets of different shapes and sizes on its surface. There are two most special chicken shaped rocks, one rooster and one hen facing each other in the middle of blue water and gentle wind of Halong. They have become not only the symbols of Halong but also the symbol of a passionate love.
9. Floating village

This village is one of the hightlights of the trip to experience the local life of citizens living in these floating houses for many generations. Fishing is still the main income for people living here. You can see that the fresh seafood here is served with great quality thanks to this village.
Further information about Ha Long Bay- No.1 tourist attraction in Vietnam, please contact us via vietnamvisavoa.com or support@vietnamvisavoa.com

column1: 8281,"[:en]Top 10 places of interest in Nha Trang[:vi]Biển Nha Trang [:zh]芽庄[:]","[:en]<h2>

column2: Top 10 places of interest in Nha Trang you should visit once to enjoy the holiday of a lifetime.
1. Vinpearl Land

Mentioned about top 10 places of interest in Nha Trang, we can not miss Vinpearl Land. It is situated on Tre island, Nha Trang province. It is regarded as “heavenly beautiful island” with its long seaside and clean beaches around the year. It is the most famous resort of Nha Trang. Besides luxurious hotels and spectacular gardens, swimming pools and trees, landscape here organizes many games for tourists.
2. Hon Mun Island

Hon Mun island has very pure watermald with beautiful corals which are recognized by the WWF and is the most various biological ecosystem in Vietnam. You could not miss some outstanding actitivities such as diving, swimming. It deserves to be in top 10 places of interest in Nha Trang.
3. Hon Tam island

This island has the area of 110 ha, is 7Km from the Nha Trang city  to the  Southern East. From the Hon Tam island, you can see the whole Nha Trang to the North and Cam Ranh Peninsula to the South. Besides spectacular beaches, it is also famous for many activities of exploring the undersea water, including coral sightseeing.
4. Ninh Van island

About 60Km from Nha Trang city, situated on Hon Meo peninsula, Ninh Van island is a pristine beach. It is specially suitable for those who would like to find out the comfortable , peaceful hidding-place. In addition, you can see corals, dive under the water or surfing, water-skiing or kayaking.
It just takes about 20 minutes from Nha Trang by high-speed boat. It also has Six Senses Ninh Van  resort, one of first resorts of Vietnam with 5-star quality.
5. Institute of Oceanography Nha Trang

It was established in 1923 and situated 6 Km far from the centre of Nha Trang city. It owns over 20.000 objects of 4.000 sea creatures that have been collected for many years.  Especially, this will make you witness the whole bone of dolphin with 26 meters in length. It will be an useful education centre that worths to visit.
6. Ponagar Tower

Ponagar Tower is a architectural construction of the Cham people. It is located for 2 Km to the North of Nha Trang city. The whole complex includes 4 towers, 2 temples and the biggest tower is Ponagar Godness.
7. Husband island-Wife island

It is about 3 Km from the centre of Nha Trang city to the Northern East. Husband island is a stone island with various types, shapes of stone. Another smaller stone complex , situated below the hill of the East, is known as Wife island. It is one of the best  tourist attractions in Nha Trang.
8. Van Phong islet
It is belong to Van Ninh, Khanh Hoa province, is 40 Km from the city centre of Nha Trang to the North. It is really attractive to tourists with its pristine beauty and the various islands.
9. Dai Lanh beach

It is situated Van Ninh , Khanh Hoa province is 80Km to the North. You can go swimming and rent a boat visiting the Khai Luong fishing village, Dam Mon or Vung Ro harbor to experience more about the life of people.
10.  Dam Market

It is also included in top 10 places of interest in Nha Trang. This is a very beautiful construction of Nha Trang when it is situated in the city center. It is very interesting to buy souvenirs and local crafts here.
More information about "Top 10 places of interest in Nha Trang" and any other questions should be sent to: support@vietnamvisavoa.com /hotline:: +84.941.279.289

column1: 8411,"[:en]Is Vietnam visa on arrival legitimate ?[:zh]越南旅游指南[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Is Vietnam visa on arrival legitimate ?

If you have been planning a business trip or personal vacation to the country of Vietnam, you have probably been doing a lot of research. You obviously need a passport to enter Vietnam, but you also need to have a valid visa to enter the country.

In doing your research, you may have learned that the country of Vietnam has implemented a program designed to make it easier for travelers, especially travelers who do not live close to the Embassy/ Consulate. This program is known as Vietnam visa on arrival, and travelers can arrange to get an approval letter before they leave their home country.

Those travelers can then present their approval letter, get their entry visas and be on their way. You may have heard some rumblings lately that this program, and the approval letters provided by companies like ours, is a scam. We do not know the specifics of these rumors, so we are unable to comment on exactly what was said.

It is important for our clients to understand that the visa on arrival program and the approval letters have both been approved by the Vietnam Immigration Department, a branch of the Vietnamese government. This is not a program that we invented. Instead, it is a legitimate service, approved by the government of Vietnam, that we are able to offer our clients.

It is also important to keep in mind that there are strict penalties for the abuse of this program, and we would go to jail if we failed to live up to the promises we make to our clients. That is because the authorities in Vietnam are responsible for policing the program, and those same police are on duty at the airports where the Vietnam visa on arrival program is put into practice.

If you are planning to travel to Vietnam for business or pleasure, you can obtain the entry visa you need by visiting Vietnam Embassy/ Consulate, and many travelers who live close to embassies still choose to do so. There are a number of problems with this approach; however, starting with the fact that many people do live far away from them. Even for those who do live nearby, it can be difficult to manage time to get the visa, since Embassies/ Consulate often have limited working. For those travelers, who get Vietnam visa done online with us will get a valid visa approval letter via email to fly into Vietnam and collect their stamped visa upon arrival. Far from being a scam, this service is a legitimate way for travelers to embark on their trips without the hassle and expense of submitting visa request at Vietnam Embassy/ Consulate.

column1: 8595,"[:en]5 mistakes on Vietnam visa on arrival[:zh]越南落地签证的5种错误[:]","[:en]<h2>

column2: There are 5 mistakes onVietnam visa on arrival below.

1. There is no visa on arrival without applying online visa form. One of 5 mistakes on Vietnam visa on arrival is that some people still think that they can get a visa directly at Vietnam airport without applying online. They can end up with delaying your flights and it takes a lot of time until the visa is approved. The government of Vietnam has created favorable condition for tourists and enterprises coming to Vietnam by applying visa on  arrival since 2003. From then on, getting visa to Vietnam becomes easier and more convenient.
<h2 style=""text-align:center"">

column3: Vietnam visa on arrival.

column2: 2. Visa on arrival is applied for air travel only. It means that there is no on arrival visa for overland or border crossing or sea or water entry. Hence, if you do not enter Vietnam by air, you need to make sure that you have already had the visa in advance.

3. Many applicants could not fill in the application form right. You must check your full name on passport, passport number or date of birth. To some extents, it may not be a big problem. However, in some cases; these wrong types can be declined by the airline at the departure airport because the information on the letter of approval does not match those in the passport.

4. Many people think that the visa validity will start from the date they enter Vietnam, not from the date they provide. However, it is totally wrong. The visa validity will begin from the date you apply the online visa form in advance, not from the date you enter the country. Therefore, you have to make sure that you make a detailed plan of when entering before ordering a visa to Vietnam.

5. Many people think that it is easy to extend a visa once they are in Vietnam. However, in fact, it is not easy at all. Visa extension can very costly and time- consuming. If you are going to stay more, you  just apply for a 3-month visa in advance instead of a 1-month one to save more money. If you want to enter Vietnam for once during you are in Vietnam, you have to ask for visa on arrival for single entry. If you want to go out Vietnam and then enter again, you have to ask for multiple entry visa so that you can enter and leave Vietnam whenever you want during the time of your visa efficiency.
For further information about 5 mistakes on Vietnam visa on arrival, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.941279289.

1. There is no visa on arrival without applying online visa form. Some people still think that they can get a visa directly at Vietnam airport without applying online. They can end up with delaying your flights and it takes a lot of time until the visa is approved. The government of Vietnam has created favorable condition for tourists and enterprises coming to Vietnam by applying visa on  arrival since 2003. From then on, getting visa to Vietnam becomes easier and more convenient.
<h2 style=""text-align:center"">

column3: Vietnam visa on arrival.

column2: 2. Visa on arrival is applied for air travel only. It means that there is no on-arrival visa for overland or border crossing or sea or water entry. Hence, if you do not enter Vietnam by air, you need to make sure that you have already had the visa in advance.

3. Many applicants could not fill in the application form right. You must check your full name on passport, passport number or date of birth. To some extents, it may not be a big problem. However, in some cases; these wrong types can be declined by the airline at the departure airport because the information on the letter of approval does not match those in the passport.

4. Many people think that the visa validity will start from the date they enter Vietnam, not from the date they provide. However, it is totally wrong. The visa validity will begin from the date you apply the online visa form in advance, not from the date you enter the country. Therefore, you have to make sure that you make a detailed plan of when entering before ordering a visa to Vietnam.

5. Many people think that it is easy to extend a visa once they are in Vietnam. However, in fact, it is not easy at all. Visa extension can very costly and time- consuming. If you are going to stay more, you  just apply for a 3-month visa in advance instead of a 1-month one to save more money. If you want to enter Vietnam for once during you are in Vietnam, you have to ask for visa on arrival for single entry. If you want to go out Vietnam and then enter again, you have to ask for multiple entry visa so that you can enter and leave Vietnam whenever you want during the time of your visa efficiency.

column1: 8598,"[:en]How many types of Vietnam visa? [:zh]越南签证有多少种？[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: - How many types of Vietnam visa?
- There are many types of Vietnam visa that are classified by the purposes of flights and the time for temporatory stay and times of immigrations to Vietnam.
1. For purpose of flight: Vietnam visa is divided into 3 categories:
Tourist visa: This visa is valued for one month.
Business visa: This visa is valued for 3 months.
Other visas: This visa is valued for 3 months.
Generally, there are two major types of Vietnamese visa including tourist visa and business visa.
2. For time of temporary stay in Vietnam: Vietnam visa is distributed into 4 types:
One-month visa with once of immigration (entering Vietnam for once only)
One-month visa with many times of immigration (entering Vietnam for many times)
Three-month visa with once of immigration (entering Vietnam for once only)
Three-month visa with many times of immigration (entering Vietnam for many times)

有一些越南签证的类型是根据飞行目的和暂时停留以及移居越南时划分的。
1.对飞行目的划分的签证类型：越南签证分为3类：
旅游签：这种签证有效期是1个月。
商务签：这种签证有效期是3个月。
其他签证：这种签证有效期是3个月。
一般来说，有两种主要类型的越南签证，包括旅游签证和商务签证。
2.对暂时停留在越南的时间：越南签证被分为4种类型：
移居一次为期一个月的签证（仅进入越南一次）
移居多次为期一个月的签证（进入越南多次）
