column1: 8632,"[:en]How do you feel about visa on arrival ? [:zh]你如何看待落地签证？[:]","[:en]

column2: As an American businessman working in the insurance agency, I usually go on business to many countries throughout the world and I have to make a visa to those countries. Because we expand the demand of Vietnam market, I usually have to fight to Vietnam to meet our partners and customers. Before each fight, I was so afraid of going to Vietnam embassies to ask for a visa due to being time-consuming of the visa process. Although I did not have any difficulties at the embassies, however, it took so much time for traveling and health so I search for Information on The Internet and I see whether any agency can provide visa on arrival or not. Surprisingly, the government of Vietnam has created favorable condition for tourists and businessmen to Vietnam easily by using visa on arrival since 2003.

Many American traveler like me and other foreign people still feel so confused about the safety and how to make a visa to Vietnam. Today I want to share with you the ways how to make a visa on arrival and the advantages and disadvangtages in making a visa and how to use an visa on arrival to Vietnam.
You just need follow 3 steps for a visa on arrival.

Firstly, you need to find a reliable agency in Vietnam to provide visa on arrival service to Vietnam and then fill the online visa application form in their websites and pay the service fee for that agency. You can choose many types of payment such as via credit card, banking transfer, Western Union system and Money Gram.

column3: Application for visa on arrival.

column2: After you receive your private information for making a visa, the agency will confirm the information and send necessary materials to immigration department of Vietnam for your letter approval. It normally takes one to three days so you do not have to wait for a long time. In case you want to take it faster, you are free to use an urgent service and you can use the urgent service to take visa during twenty-four hours.

The approval letter will be sent through your email. You just need to print and bring it to the airport. At the international airport in Vietnam, you will submit your approval letter for immigration officer and pay for stamping fee. Then, you could enter Vietnam legally.
You can see that it is very easy to make a visa to Vietnam! By the way, I want to share with you some experience for quick visa stamp at the international airport in Vietnam.

Besides the approval letter, you should print and fill in immigration entry  and exist visa form before you go in order to save time at the airport. (You can ask for this application from the travel agency making visa).
Prepare 2 photos of 4*6 cm against a white background.

Prepare to stamp at the border crossing, you should be available with U.S dollar, Euro, Pound and Vietnamese dong), the stamping fee can be applied to all nations, 45$ per 1 month or 3 - month single visa, 65$ per 1 month or 3 months multiple entries visa, 95$ per person for multiple entries visa for 3 months.

The most important thing when making a visa is to provide your full information and make sure it is as the same as in your passport. Because if you make wrong, you have to make your visa from the beginning again. (At once time, I filled the form wrong by mistake, however, my travel agency which I was receiving their visa service made it free for me). After receiving your approval letter, you also should verify your information, if anything wrong happens, it is urgent that you need to call for your travel agency to correct it immediately.
All the aforementioned things are its benefits and strengths of visa on arrival, however, it still has some bad points:
Customers find it easy to be cheated due to some unreliable travel agencies ( I used to get into this trouble).

Visa on arrival type has not built trust in users for their first time. The reason is that they could not find any website of the government of Vietnam for its approval and permission for making visa on arrival. Customs officers make our travelers uncomfortable. It takes us for about half to an hour for immigration. (As far as I am concerned, my travel agency that I usually take their visa service offers welcome service to assist their customers in making immigration formality fast.)

Based on my experience of making visa to Vietnam, you should choose a trustworthy travel agency with experience for making visa for a long time. If you have not got any decent address, vietnamvisaonline.net is a good accompany. This is the first travel agency I chose to make visa and nowadays, I still choose this one to make visa whenever I come to Vietnam. After that, I used visa service to Vietnam of other holiday companies such as VisaonArrival.net or VietnamVisa123.com, but the service was as not good as the company I have chosen.

I also introduce and share with many friends, relatives, and my partners when they have the demand to Vietnam and make visa. Hope that you have had some necessary information for making Vietnam visa on arrival  and will have great experience in this fascinating and beautiful Vietnam!
From Blogger: Hani Acelife

(Updated stamping fee: 25 USD/person for single entry. 50 USD/ person for less than 30 days multiple entries visa, 50 USD/person from 30 days to less than 90 days multiple entries visa, or 95 USD/person for 6 months multiple entries visa.)

作为一个在保险代理公司工作的美国商人，我平时出差到世界各地的许多国家，我必须要做一个签证去那些国家。因为我们拓展越南市场的需求，我经常要去越南见我们的伙伴和客户并与他们并肩作战。每次工作站之前，我要去越南大使馆签证，由于签证过程很耗时我就很害怕。虽然我在大使馆签证没有任何困难，但是它花费太多时间和精力去处理了，所以我就在网上寻找资料，看是否有哪家代理公司可以提供落地签证的。出人意料的是，自2003年，越南政府已经为游客和企业通过落地签证来越南创造了有利条件。
许多像我一样的美国旅客和其他外国人士对越南的安全性和如何做越南签证仍然感到如此困惑。今天，我想与大家分享如何做一个落地签证的方式和它的优缺点，以及如何在抵达越南时使用签证。
你只需遵循3个步骤来做越南落地签：
第一，你需要找到一个可靠的机构在越南提供落地签证服务，然后在他们的网站上填写签证申请表，并支付服务费给机构。你可以选择许多支付方式像信用卡，银行转账，西联汇款和速汇金。

column3: 落地签证申请

column2: 在你收到你做签证的个人信息之后，代理机构为你的批准函会确认信息并发送必要的材料给越南移民局。一般需要一至三天，所以你不必等待很长的时间。假如你想要更快，您可以自由使用加急服务，您可以加急24小时内取得签证。
批准函将通过电子邮件发送给您。你只需要在机场打印出来即可。在越南国际机场，你将提交批准函给移民官员然后支付印章费，然后你就可以合法进入与越南了。
可以看出做越南签证是非常容易的！此外，我像跟你分享一些快速在越南国际机场给签证盖章的经验。
除了批准函之外，为了节省时间，你在到机场之前要打印并填写移民出入境表格（你可以向做签证的旅行机构申请）
准备2张4*6cm的白底照片
准备在边境盖章签证，你可以用美元，欧元，英镑和越南盾，盖章费适用于所有国家，一个月或3个月单次的签证45美金一个人，一个月或3个月多次签证65美金一个人，3个月多次的每个人95美金。
做签证时，最重要的是你充分提供的信息，并确保它跟您的护照信息是一致的。因为如果你出错的话，你不得不重新再做过签证。（有一次，我填写表格填错了，但是我的旅行社是免费给我拿到签证了）收到您的批准函之后，您还应该验证您的信息，如果发生了什么错误，当务之急是你需要通知你的旅行社立即更正过来。
上面所述的都是落地签证的好处和优势，但是，它还是存在些不尽人意的地方：
由于一些不可靠的旅行社，客户发现这很容易被人骗（我曾经有过这样的麻烦）。
他们刚开始办理入境签证时，还没有在用户间建立起信任。原因是他们无法找到任何越南政府可以审批和许可做落地签的网站。
海关人员让我们的游客感到很不安。这大概要花费半个小时到一个小时出入境。（对于我本人而言，我经常办理签证服务的旅行社提供给他们的客户欢迎服务协助出入境手续变得更快）
根据我做越南签证的经验，你应该选择一个值得信赖的，有长时间做签证经验的旅行社。如果你没有任何正经的旅行社网址，vietnamvisaonline.net是一个很好的陪伴。这是我至今为止选择的第一家做签证的旅行社，每当我到越南我还是会选择它做签证。在那以后，我用其他做越南签证服务的公司像VisaonArrival.net或VietnamVisa123.com，但服务都没有我之前选的公司那么好。
我也介绍和分享给我许多亲朋好友和我的合作伙伴，当他们有需求做越南签证的时。希望你有一些做越南落地签的必要信息，并希望你在越南能有个有趣又美丽的经历！
来自博主：Hani Acelife

column1: 8647,"[:en]Visa to Vietnam for pets[:zh]宠物的越南签证[:]","[:en]

column2: You always think about traveling with someone as your partner. Have you ever thought that you can bring your pets for traveling together? Or you could not travel with your puppy or kittens. You feel nervous when traveling in other countries without your care or care of someone else.

Let think about these following tips to bring you pets to Vietnam. These tips must make your trip hassle-free and certainly much more straightforward than your expectation. You should not waste your time and money for agencies or departments who may actually never have been to Vietnam themselves before.
Visa to Vietnam for pets includes three main steps belows:

1. It is obligatory for you pet to be vaccinated for rabies at least 30 days ahead of traveling to Vietnam and no more than a year before traveling. Then, you take the veterinary certificate and have your accredited veterinarian filled in the form to confirm that the pet is healthy, free of parasites and there is no sign of diseases transmittable to humankind.

2.  You have to enclose the “Pet’s Inoculation Record”, which is a record of all vaccinations injected to the pet with its name, origin and batch number of the vaccine to the “Veterinary Certificate”.

It is important to have the rabies vaccination,however, other vaccines are optional for dogs and cats such as rabies, distemper, hepatitis, leptospirosis, distemper, viral rhinotracheitis and leukemia.

3.  When you upon come to Vietnam, you must show that certificate and record to the immigration officer. At the airport, you have to show them to quarantine to have them processed. You should make sure that you either get or make copies of your certificates as they might want to keep a copy for their records. It will help things faster instead of taking so much time at the airport.  After that,your dog or cat will come out with the rest of the luggage. Thenm, you and your pets legally enter Vietnam.

It is  recommended that you have the visa beforehand and don't get it on arrival. You can send your passport to the embassy in your country to get your visa to Vietnam or you should ask for help from a reliable travel agency for making visa on arrival to Vietnam. If you want to ask for embassy, it can be time-consuming. Instead of that, you are adviced to take visa on arrival service from trave agencies. It is not dificult and takes time.  You just have to fill in an application for visa on arrival and pay service fees. If you make a visa when you come to the airport, it can be delayed and you have to wait for an hour. During that time, if your pets are sensitive with the heat or being scared, you must worry about them. Hence, you had better get a visa on arrival to get your visa to Vietnam beforehand to avoid these issues.

One thing you need to notice is that your pet is put in a crate during the flight. To make sure that your pet gets used to the crate, you should  put your pets into the crate before several days. You can see that bringing your pets to Vietnam is not difficult. Hope that you have great visit to Vietnam!

你经常会想跟你的伙伴一起旅行。你有没有想过，你可以带着你的宠物一起旅行？或者你也可以不与你的小狗小猫旅行。没有身边人一起和你在其他国家旅行你感到紧张。让我们看看下面这些关于带着你的宠物在越南旅游的提示。这些技巧肯定使你的旅行变得轻松无比，肯定比你期望的更简单更直接。你不应该把时间和金钱浪费在那些可能从来没有到过越南的机构或部门上。
跟你的宠物到越南旅行包含以下三个重要的步骤：
1.    在前往越南之前提前至少30天为你的宠物接种狂犬病疫苗，并不超过1年时间出行。然后，你把兽医证书，并有你填好了的兽医认可的表单，以确认该宠物是健康，无寄生虫，也没有疾病传染给人类的迹象。
2.    你必须附上“宠物的接种记录”，这是注射用疫苗的名称，宠物的名字，产地和批号的 “兽药证书”的所有接种疫苗的记录。
3.    当您到越南时，你必须把证明证书和记录交给移民官查看。在机场，你必须隔离让他们检疫处理。你要确保你有证书的复印件，因为他们可能要保存一份副本作为他们的记录。这会更加快捷而不是在机场花那么多时间。之后，你的猫狗将跟着你的行李出来，然后你和你的宠物就可以合法进入越南了。

建议您提前办好签证，不要在抵达时才拿到签证。你可以在自己国家的领事馆寄送护照获得你的签证，或者你可以寻找一家可靠的做越南落地签的旅行社帮忙。如果你想找使馆做签证，可能是耗时间的。相反的是，建议你找有落地签证服务的旅行社。这不是很难办也不是很花时间。你只需要填写落地签证的申请，并支付服务费。如果你做签证，当你来到机场时，它可能会延迟，你必须等待一个小时。在此期间，如果你的宠物因为热或被惊吓而敏感，你肯定担心他们。因此，你最好在抵达时事先拿到越南签证，以避免这些问题。
你需要注意的一件事是，在飞行过程中你要把你的宠物放在一个箱子。为了确保你的宠物习惯于箱子，你应该提前几天把你的宠物放进箱子里。你可以看到，把你的宠物带到越南并不困难。希望你有个愉快的越南旅程！
为了节省时间和确保给你最好的品质，为您提供支持是我们的荣幸。

column1: 8673,"[:en]One-year visa to Vietnam for U.S. citizens [:zh]美国公民为期一年的越南签证[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: In recent years, the American citizen had mentioned about visa process of Vietnam, which has made it hard for them to ask for visa and immigrate in Vietnam. After discussion about the human resources, in this morning April 4, 2016,  the president Ms Tran Dai Quang presented the consensus on granting U.S citizens one-year visa to Vietnam.

According to Vietnam's 2014 immigration law, U.S citizens are currenlty allowed to stay in for 3 months at maximum. Now the U.S citizens has asked the Vietnamese government to extend visa for its citizens because visa extension has done the same for Vietnamese passport holders.
<h3 style=""text-align:center"">

column3: It is easy for U.S citizens with one-year visa to Vietnam.

column2: With this offer, this new visa policy is expected to promote economic and trade ties between the two countries. More importantly, it draws U.S tourists to Vietnam, said Deputy Prime Minister Pham Binh Minh at a meeting with the standing Committee of the National Assembly late last year.
Vietnam is the only one country among the 11 Trans-Pacific Partnership members that offers three-month visa to U.S citizens, according to U.S diplomatic officials.

Because tourism revenue contributes around 6% to Vietnam GDP, the government has offered visa exemptions for single-entry to Germany, French, Italian, Spanish and the United Kingdom citizens. So it is a good news that the U.S will soon able to enter Vietnam on a one-year visa rather than a three-month visa.
It is recommended that you can send us more questions about this procedure and its costs for one-year visa to Vietnam as well for your detailed plan to get a visa to Vietnam more than three months.

近年来，美国公民已经注意到越南，这使得他们很难取得签证和移民越南。关于与人力资源的探讨后，在2016年4月4日上午，陈代广总统女士提出了关于授予美国公民为期一年的签证，这与越南达成了共识。
根据2014年越南移民法，美国公民目前获准停留越南最多三个月。现在美国公民已要求越南政府对他们的签证延期，因为美国同样也是对越南护照持有者做签证延期的。
<h3 style=""text-align:center"">

column3: 美国公民在越南为期一年的签证变得容易了

column2: 有了这个提议，这种新的签证政策有望促进两国之间的经济和贸易关系。更重要的是，它吸引美国游客到越南，副总理范平明在去年年底常务委员会国民会议上说。
根据美国外交官指出，越南是11个跨太平洋伙伴关系成员中唯一一个为美国公民提供三个月签证的国家。越南国内生产总值
中由于旅游收入的贡献约为6％，政府为德国，法国，意大利，西班牙和英国公民提供单次入境的签证豁免。所以这是一个好消息，美国将很快能够有为期一年的签证到越南，而不是一个为期三个月的签证。
建议你可以给我们介绍关于这个进程的更多问题和它的成本，以及你超过三个月签证的越南的详细计划。

column2: Four popular Vietnam International Airports ?

Traveling by air has become more and more popular among other means of transportation for those who traveling to Vietnam. Accordingly, getting Vietnam visa on arrival is a common way for travelers to Vietnam.

One thing that you must know is that there are 4 international airports accept Vietnam visa on arrival: Tan Son Nhat airport (in Ho Chi Minh /Saigon city), Noi Bai airport (in Ha Noi city), Da Nang airport (Da Nang city) and Cam Ranh airport (in Nha Trang city).

Each airport above is equipped with food services, dotted with souvenirs shop and money exchange stalls. On the flip side, you will easily find your way around the airport without being afraid of getting lost or being late for your flight. Nevertheless, the size of each airport (except for Noi Bai, Tan Son Nhat) is relatively small compared to other international airports in the region. Among those airports, Noi Bai International is the biggest airport in Northern Vietnam. The airport itself is located 45 kilometers from Hanoi city center which takes roughly 30 minutes by a taxi.
How does Vietnam visa on arrival works at Vietnam International Airport?

When you are upon your landing airport, be ready to provide Immigration officer at visa upon arrival area with your Vietnamese visa approval letter, Vietnamese visa application form, stamping fee in cash and your original passport. column2: How to apply Vietnam visa ?
This article is written down for those who are going to Vietnam for their visiting or working to know how to apply Vietnam visa right.

Originally, everyone who would like to enter Vietnam had to go to Embassies for applying Vietnam visa. It wasted time a lot and was quite expensive. However, from July 1, 2015 to June 30, 2016, citizens from five countries in Europe including the UK, France, Germany, Spain and Italy will enjoy 15-day visa exemption in Vietnam for all types of passports and immigration reasons if they meet the conditions required by Vietnamese law, according to the issued Resolution No 46/NQ-CP by Vietnamese Government.

If anyone would like to stay more than 15 days in Vietnam, how to apply Vietnam visa, they are recommended to apply for online Vietnam visa on arrival. It is better than going toVietnam Embassy because asking a Vietnam visa extension there might be time-consuming and expensive.

To apply for Vietnam visa on arrival, you must choose travelling by air and pick up visa at the airport. It is not difficult as you thought at all. You just follow those steps to get a visa easier and quicker.
Step 1: Fill in the secure online form

Fill in an online visa application form and make sure your personal information correct and even as same as yours in your passport. Many applicants fill in the application form with WRONG information: full name, passport number or date of birth. However, there is no serious problem from this.

It can take longer time or even get trouble at the departure airport if the information on your approval letter doesn’t match those in your passport. So, to make sure that everything is ok and you can avoid from unexpected problems, let be careful when entering everything correctly and carefully because it just takes you just a little time.
Step 2: Confirm the information and pay the service fee
You will follow the guidelines before paying the service fee by confirming your personal information. Then you can receive a confirmation email at once when we get your request.

Then we will submit your information to the Vietnam Immigration Department to get the approval letter for you after receiving your payment confirmation. Check the information of service fee in vietnamvisavoa.com. You will pay $18 for a one or three month single visa entry. If you go with another person, the total fee will be $16 for a one or three month single visa entry. If you are big groups, you will get better deal. Let check it here. Then, the approval letter will be sent to your email in two working days as normal.
Step 3: Get the "Visa approval letter"

A visa approval letter will be sent to us and the information simultaneously forward to the Immigration Database on your arrival at the airport in Vietnam. Next, we send a copy of the Visa approval letter (via email or fax) to you right after receiving the approval letter from Vietnam Immigration Department. You just have to print it out and bring it with you to Vietnam airport.
Step 4: Get your visa stamped

When upon the landing airport, you need to show the Visa approval letter: At the airport, when you check in and to the Immigration officer to get the visa stamped into your passport. You are then required to fill out the entry and exit form, attach photos (4x6) cm and pay the visa stamping fee ($25 per person) to directly the Immigration officer.
For further information about  How to apply Vietnam visa, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.941279289 or follow us here!
Let's apply online for Vietnam visa on arrival easily now!

这篇文章是为那些到越南旅游观光或工作的人写的。原本，每个人都希望到大使馆申请越南签证进入越南。这太浪费时间和费用也很高。但是，从2015年7月1日到2016年6月30日，根据越南政府发行46 / NQ-CP决议案，来自欧洲5个国家的公民包含英国，法国，德国，西班牙和意大利，如果他们符合越南法律规定的条件，对所有护照类型和出入境原因的公民将享受越南15天免签证的。如果有人想留在越南超过15天，他们会被建议在线申请越南落地签证。最好是去大使馆申请签证延期，因为延期很耗时，也很贵。申请越南落地签证，你必须选择乘飞机旅游，在机场拿签证，这并不是你想象中的那么难。你只要根据以下获取签证的步骤就会更容易更快捷。
第1步：在线填写安全表格
填写在线签证申请表，并确保您的个人信息正确，和你的护照上的信息一样。许多申请者会填写申请表的时候会填错信息：全名，护照号码，或出生日期。填错的话也没有很大问题，如果批准函的信息和你的护照信息不一致的话可能会花更长时间甚至在起飞机场会遇到麻烦。所以，确保所有的信息都是准确的，你就可以避免一些意外的事情。认真地准确地填写所有信息，因为它只花你一点点时间而已。
第2步：确认信息并支付服务费

你要遵循在支付服务费之前确认好你的个人信息的原则。然后我们收到你的请求时，你会立即收到一个确认邮件。之后我们会提交你的信息给越南入境事务处，在收到你的支付确认之后会拿到批准函。在vietnamvisavoa.com网站上检查信息服务费，一个月或三个月单次签证将支付18美金，如果你和另外一人同行，一个月或三个月的单次入境的全部费用是16美金。如果你是一个大团体，你将有更实惠的价格。检查一下，然后批准函将在2个正常工作日发电子邮件给你。
第3步：拿“签证批准函”
一个签证批准函将会发送给我们，同时信息会传送到你抵达越南机场的入境事务处的数据库里。下一步在收到由越南入境事务处发过来的批准函后我们会马上发送签证批准函的备份文件（通过电子邮件或传真）给你，你只要打印出来再带到越南机场就行了。
第4步：拿你的签证盖章
当你到达着陆机场，你需要展示签证批准函：在机场，当你入境时到移民局官员处拿签证盖章到你的护照上。你会被要求填写出入境表格，附带照片（4*6cm）和支付签证印章费（25美金/人）直接给移民局官员。

column1: 8786,"[:en]Is applying Vietnam visa easy?[:zh]越南签证容易吗？[:]","[:en]<h1 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Is applying Vietnam visa easy?

Entering Vietnam seems to be quite easy for international travelers nowadays with visa on arrival. It is an alternative way for getting to the Embassy and just stay at home with Internet connection. You fill in the Online Application Form and then pay the service fee. After we obtain the approval letter, we will forward you a copy by email. Then you can keep it to Vietnam international airports only, the immigration officers will issue your entry visa.

You just have to pay for two fees: service and stamping fees. For vietnamvisavoa.com, the service fee is $18/person for one or three month single entry visa. You can pay through credit cards or debit for your approval letter. It is paid for the approval letter. The visa approval letter is a document approved by the Immigration Office that allows you to enter and exist Vietnam for a given time period. You must have the approval letter so that you could pick up your visa upon arrival at one of Vietnam international airports: Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh, Nha Trang, Da Nang. Because visa on arrival is not valid for overland entry. You can receive the approval letter after 2 normal working days. Even in urgent case, you can use our special service to get the approval letter fast.

You should apply for an online visa application form in advance from1 to 6 months. Although it just takes only 3-5 working days to get your visa appoved, it is advised that you apply for visa on arrival 1-2 weeks before your arrival date to avoid some unexpected administrative problems. With visa on arrival, you could not travel Vietnam without the letter and the visa when you arrive. Even if your passport is about to be expired, you have to get a new one before applying for your visa on arrival to Vietnam. At least, your passport has 6 month's validity.

You then have to prepare 2 photos of standard passport size(4*6cm). The stamping fee is fixed with $25 and $50 for single entry and multiple entry respectively. It can take you about 15 minutes in total for this process.

The visa on arrival is quite easy with visa extension for those who are going to stay in Vietnam more than 3 months or ven 1 year. You just need to contact us, we are happy to make this visa for you as long as you have to tell us before your visa is out of dated.
For further information about Vietnam visa easy,  follow us at vietnamvisavoa.com or contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com

如今对持有落地签的国际旅客来说进入越南似乎很容易，在大使馆获取签证和仅仅呆在家里连接互联网获取签证是二中择一的方式。你填写在线申请表格然后支付服务费，在我们获得批准函之后，我们将通过电子邮件发一份副本给你，然后你可以拿着它到越南国际机场，移民官将给你发入境签证。

你只需要支付两种费用：服务费和印章费。服务费是一个月或三个月单次入境签证18美金/人。你可以通过信用卡或借记卡来支付你的批准函。这是支付批准函的费用。签证批准函是由移民局批准的文件，是允许你在一个固定的时间段进入越南的。你必须有批准函你才能在抵达越南国际机场的任意一个机场拿到你的签证：河内，胡志明，芽庄，岘港。因为落地签对陆路入境是无效的。你可以在2个正常工作日内拿到批准函。即使是紧急情况，你可以使用我们的特殊服务更快地拿到批准函。
你可以提前1到6个月申请一个在线签证申请表格。即使它只需要花费3-5个工作日拿到你的签证批准。建议你在您抵达前1-2周申请落地签证，以避免一些意想不到的管理问题。随着落地签的到来，你去越南旅游当你到达时你不能没有批准函和签证。即使你的护照即将过期，在申请越南落地签之前你必须申请一个新的。至少，你的护照要有6个月的有效期。
然后，你必须准备2张标准护照尺寸（4×6厘米）的照片。印章费分别为25美金单次入境和50美金多次入境，这个过程一共要花费你15分钟左右。
落地签证是为那些要留在越南超过3个月，甚至1年的签证延期是很容易的。你只需要告知我们，我们很乐意为你办理签证。在你的签证要过期之前必须要告诉我们。

column1: 8794,"[:en]Who is exempted for Vietnam visa?[:zh]谁能豁免越南签证？[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Have you ever thought that you were born in a lucky country that have exemption agreement for Vietnam visa ? Normally, all foreign visitors need a visa before entering Vietnam. However, if you are citizens of these countries with Vietnam visa exemption, you can enter Vietnam without visa to stay within a certain period of time. Get more details for Vietnam visa exemption list as belows:

Denmark, Finland, Norway, Russia and Sweden, UK, France, Germany, Italy and Spain get 15 days visa exemption, however, please keep in mind that if you would love to get waive visa more than once then your next entry must be 30 days after the last exit date.

For Asian countries, people from Brunei and Myanmar can stay in Vietnam within 14 days. Japan and South Korea wiil have 15 days. The Philippines could enjoy within 21 days. Other countries  are Cambodia, Indonesia, Malaysia, Laos, Singapore and Thailand can enter Vietnam within 30 days without visa.

If people who enter Vietnam through an international border gate and then travel to Phu Quoc and stay here can enjoy a waiver program of 15 days. It could be within 60 days for APEC Business Travel Card holders and 90 days for Chile and French citizens holding valid diplomatic or official passports.

Although anyone is not from above listed countries or anyone wants to stay in Vietnam longer than the authorised period of stay, they can arrange a visa  by applying visa to nearby Vietnam Embassy/Consulate or getting visa on arrival by applying for visa online.

Please notice that whether you are required a visa or not, your passport still needs to be in valid no less than 6 months prior to the trip or at least 1 month after visa expiry date and has at least one empty visa page left.
For further information about Vietnam visa exemption, please send us a message via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84. 941279289 and we are happy to support you at any time.
Apply online now!
你有没有想过你出生在一个幸运的国家，可以有豁免越南签证的协议？通常情况下，所有的外国游客需要在进入越南之前办理签证。但是，如果你是这些国家的公民是免除越南签证，可以无需签证进入越南在一定的时间期限内停留。越南签证豁免清单的详细信息如下：

丹麦，芬兰，挪威，俄罗斯，瑞典，英国，法国，德国，意大利和西班牙获得15天签证豁免，但是请记住，如果你想得到不止一次的签证豁免，那么你的下一次入境必须是距离上次离境日期的30天之后。对于亚洲国家，文莱和缅甸人可以在越南停留14天。日本和南韩将停留15天，菲律宾可以停留21天。其他国家如柬埔寨，印度尼西亚，马来西亚，老挝，新加坡和泰国人可以免签进入越南30天。如果谁通过国际关口进入越南然后前往富国岛游玩的话可以享受免签15天。这可能是在60天内对APEC商务旅行卡持有者和智利和法国公民持有效外交或公务护照在90天内是免签的。
虽然不是任何人都是来自上述列出的国家，想要在越南停留得比授权周期停留的更长时间，他们可以通过在附近越南大使馆/领事馆申请签证或在网站http://vietnamvisavoa.com/cap-visa/在线提交签证申请获得落地签证办理签证。
请注意不管你是否申请签证，你的护照仍然要在旅行之前有不少于6个月的有效期，或在签证到期之后的1个月在护照左边至少要有一页的签证空白页。
欲了解更多信息，请通过support1@vietnamvisavoa.com给我们发送消息，我们很高兴在任何时间为您提供支持。

column1: 8811,"[:en]Do you know anything about Vietnam visa extension?[:zh]有关越南签证延期的事项[:]","[:en]

column2: If you are considering which country you are going to visit for your next holiday, let keep Vietnam in your mind. It can be sure that you must have heard that so many visitors must be amazed before its magnificient beauty and richly-cultured country.

If you are going to visit Vietnam, you might think about Vietnam visa and visa extension because you can hesitate before Vietnam's beauty and want to stay in Vietnam more. What Vietnam visa extension is, what its procedure is and why you have to make a visa extension, I will explain in details below.
1.What is Vietnam visa extension?
It means that it is the visa offering extra time if you are going to stay longer than your permission without leaving Vietnam.

In order to apply for Vietnam visa extension, your current visa has to meet some requirements of Vietnam Immigration Deparment. Extending Vietnam visa must be applied some days before your visa is expired. Your current visa type has to be correspondent to your stay in extending requirement. If you current visa is one month single, 1 month multiple, you are allowed  to extend visa in one month more. If your current visa is 3 month single or 3 month multiple entry visa, you can apply to extend visa in three more months.
<h3 style=""text-align:center"">

column3: Vietnam visa application form

column2: 2. What is procedure of Vietnam visa extension?

Check visit status: Because a limited group of people can apply for this option, we need to check your visa status first. You can provide us your nationality, type of visa, port of entry, latest date of your entry and duration of extension you want to ask for.

Collect origin passport: After that, if your visa is extendable and we will inform you about it and its price. If you agree with our service, then our staff will meet you and collect your passport in person for information sercurity.

Get passport back and pay service fee: The process for visa extension application is 7 working days. If you want to speed up the process, the additional cost will be required. We will return the passport to you with new visa stamp.
3. How much does it cost to Vietnam visa extension?

Actually, the Vietnam visa fee for visa extension varies for each application such as nationality, port of entry and duration of visa extension. This kind of visa extension is much cheaper than renewal visa. That is the reason why more foreign visitors like to pick up visa extension to stay longer in Vietnam without leaving the country. It is an economical option but is is not easy for the visa extension process so governments of many countries do not focus on this. It is recommended to need help from travel agent to make it easy for you.

Moreover, due to recent changes in immigration laws, the visa extension process is more complicated. As a result, the cost is higher than before. If you wish to know its exact cost, please send us your visa information for checking and we will inform you as soon as possbile.
Latest news: The Vietnam visa extension is applicable for one month single tourist visa only now.
For further information about Vietnam visa extension, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.941279289 or follow us here!

如果你正在考虑不知道下个假期要去哪个国家旅游的话，考虑下越南吧。可以肯定的是在这之前你一定听过许多游客必定惊奇它华丽的美感和丰富的国家文化。如果你正要去越南旅游，你也许会想到越南签证和签证延期，因为你会在越南的美丽和想要在越南停留更久而犹豫不决。什么是签证延期，它的手续是怎么样的和为什么你不得不做签证延期，我将在以下几点详细解释一下。
1.什么是越南签证延期？

它指的是如果你要停留的时间比你允许停留在越南的时间更长，给签证提供额外的时间而无需离开越南。为了申请签证延期，你目前的签证必须满足越南入境事务处的一些要求。越南签证延期必须要在你的签证快要过期之前申请。你目前的签证类型一定是对应你的延期要求中的停留时间。如果你目前的签证是一个月单次的，一个月多次的，你是允许再延长一个月签证的。如果你目前的签证是3个月单次或3个月多次入境签证的，你可以申请延长3个月签证的。
<h3 style=""text-align:center"">

column3: 越南签证申请表

column2: 2.越南签证延期的手续是什么样的？
检查签证状态：因为一个有限人数的团可以申请这个选项，我们首先需要检查你的签证状态。您可以向我们提供您的国籍，签证种类，入境口岸，您入境的最近日期和你想要求延长期限的最后日期。
收集护照原件：在这之后，如果你的签证是可以延期的我们会通知你关于它的价格。如果你同意我们的服务，那么，为了个人信息安全，我们的工作人员会和大家见面，亲自领取护照。
拿回护照并支付服务费：签证延期申请的过程是7个工作日。如果你像加快进程，会要求额外的费用。我们有了新的签证盖章会将你的护照归还给你。
3.越南签证延期需要多少费用？

实际上，对于签证延期越南的费用也是因每个申请如国籍，入境关口和签证延期的持续时间不同而不同。这种类型的签证延期比续签签证便宜很多。这就是为什么越来越多的外国游客喜欢拿起签证延期停留在越南更久而没有离开这个国家的原因。这是一个经济实惠的选择，但签证延期过程是不容易的，使许多国家的政府不注重这一点。建议你需要旅行社的帮助，会使您更轻松。此外，由于移民法律最近的变化，签证延期的过程更加复杂。结果就是，费用比之前更高了。如果你想知道它的确切费用，请向我们提供您的签证信息进行查询和我们会尽快通知你。
最新新闻：越南签证延期现在仅提供给一个月单次入境的旅游申请。

column1: 8815,"[:en]How much is it for Vietnam visa fee?[:zh]越南签证费用需要多少钱？[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align: justify;"">

column2: How much is it for Vietnam visa fee?

Vietnam nowadays offers a good system for visitors to get Vietnam visa. With the development of technology, the visa process is much easier by Visa on arrival introduction.  It is an ideal choice for those who travel by air to Vietnam to international airports. Beside mentioning about the Vietnam visa on arrrival and its produres, one thing that visitors may consider visa on arrival Vietnam and its cost.

Vietnam visa on arrival is an alternative way of getting an approval letter instead of going directly to the Embassies of  Vietnam , which is so time - consuming and costs a lot of money. Vietnam visa on arrival is an online procedure that aplicants just fill in an application from the visa company's website. Then check information carefully before paying online for service and then you can receive the visa of approval from the Immigration Department to your email. Then you can keep it along when you come to Vietnam ariport to take your visa stamped at the immigration counter.
With regard to Vietnam visa fee for visa on arrival, there are two types of fees: service fee and stamping fee.

For service fee, it is the cost you would pay for your visa application form service to get the Vietnam approved letter from the Immigration Department through your travel agent. Your travel agent will process your applicaiton form and send you an approval letter via email. So you can see that our travel agent will offer the price. So, you can see that the fee varies differently. For vietnamvisavoa.com, the standard Vietnam visa cost for visa on arrival for one and three single entry visa is $18/person and $22/person respectively. For one or three month multiple entry visa, it will be $30 and $50 consecutively.

For stamping fee, it is the fee that you will directly pay for the Immigration Department at the international airport of Vietnam including Hanoi,Ho Chi Minh, Nha Trang and Da Nang. The charge which you pay involves the charge for your Vietnam visa on arrival print-out and the approval stamp on your passport. The standard stamping fee for single entry visa for both one and three month is $25/person while it is $50 for multiple entries. If anyone stays for three to six month multiple entry, it will be $95/person.
Total cost for your visa on arrival will be:
1 month single entry: $18 + $25 = $43.
1 month multiple entries: $22 +$ 50 = $72.
3 month single entry: $30 +$ 25 = $55.
3 month multiple entries: $50 + $50= $100.
These are the list of total Vietnam visa fee for Vietnam visa on arrival service you should consider . We are happy to serve you an guarantee the service and quality for you.
For further information about Vietnam visa fee,  follow us at vietnamvisavoa.com or contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com

越南落地签是获取批准函的另一种方式，而不是直接去越南大使馆，那么耗时间和花费很多钱。越南落地签是一个在线程序，申请者只要从签证公司网站上填写一份申请表格。然后在网上支付服务费之前认真检查信息，然后你就可以在你的电子邮件中接收到来自入境事务处审批的签证了。然后你可以带上它，当你到越南机场时到入境柜台加盖你的签证。
关于越南落地签证的签证费，有两种类型的费用：服务费和印章费。
对于服务费，这是你要支付给通过旅行社给你的签证申请表获得入境事务处的越南批准函的服务费。你的旅行社将处理你的申请表并通过电子邮件发送给你批准函。所以你可以看到我们的旅行社会提供价格。所以，你可以知道费用是不同的。对于vietnamvisa voa，一个月和三个月单次入境签证的落地签越南签证费用的标准分别是18美金/人和22美金/人。对于一个月或三个月多次入境签证，将是30美金/人和50美金/人。
对于印章费，这是你直接支付给越南国际机场入境事务处的，包括河内，胡志明，芽庄和岘港。你支付的费用包括越南落地签打印和在你的护照上的许可盖章。对于一次入境签证的一个月和三个月的标准印章费都是25美金/人，而它的多次入境是50美金。如果谁要停留3个月到6个月多次入境，费用是95美金/人。

column2: If you are going to travel to Vietnam, you should consider about the requirement of Vietnam visa online validity to Vietnam to select the most appropriate visa.

It is a great and quite common choice for tourists with a kind of less than 30 day visit. If you expect to stay longer, it is recommended to apply for 3 month/ 6 month visa. It depends on applicant's purpose of visit. Three month entry visa is usually listed for business purpose by default. However, some foreign visitors also use three month visa as well. column3: Vietnam visa online validity.

column2: You please notice that the period of validity starts from the proposed date of arrival in your online visa application form until the visa expires. You are free to enter Vietnam anytime during visa validity. One thing that many tourists can make mistake when applying for a visa to Vietnam on arrival is that visa validity will start from the date they are accepted legally in Vietnam, not from the date they provide. However, it is wrong. So you should make sure that you make a clear plan of when to enter ordering a visa to Vietnam.

For Vietnam visa online, the arrival date you provide can be earliest date you plan to arrive and you can arrive after that date. But more importantly, you must leave Vietnam before the expiry date stated in the approval letter. For example, if you apply for one month single visa and submit your arrival date as May 1st, 2016, the visa leter will be valid from May 1st, 2016. You can arrive anytime between May 1st 2016 but must leave Vietnam by June 1st 2016.

column1: 8850,"[:en]How to get Vietnam visa ?[:zh]如何获取越南签证？[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align: justify;"">

column2: There are 2 ways of getting Vietnam visa as below :
Get Vietnam visa at Vietnam Embassy/ Consulate

This is a traditional way to apply for Vietnam visa. You will contact to Vietnam Embassy/ Consulate in your country or any countries that you are residing there. Normally, you would need to submit the visa application form, your passport, some photos and fee to them and wait for around one week to collect your Vietnam visa. Do keep in mind that the procedure and fee may change from place to place then it is recommended that you should call the officers to get details before submitting your visa request. You may find that getting a visa in Euro or America is much higher than applying for it at countries in Asia. Therefore, you should make a plan to apply for your visa at a good time and at a reasonable price. This way of applying Vietnam visa is highly recommended for travellers  who are close to Vietnam Embassy/ Consulate and whoever travel by land or by boat to Vietnam.
Get Vietnam on arrival

You should not misunderstand that you will get Vietnam visa on arrival in the same way like visa on arrival  for some neighbor countries such as Laos, Cambodia... In order to get Vietnam visa on arrival, please ensure that you are travelling by air to Vietnam to collect stamped visa at Vietnam International airports (Noi Bai- Hanoi, Tan Son Nhat- Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang, Cam Ranh- Nha Trang). What you need to do first is to submit a visa application form online. You will pay for service fee online to get a visa approval letter ( a legal document issued by Vietnam Immigration Department as a permission for you to fly into Vietnam) via email within 1 or 2 working days. You will take with you this document along with your passport, a Vietnamese visa application form and stamping fee in cash in USD ( $ 25 US for 1 month or 3 month single entry visa, $ 50 US for 1 month or 3 months multiple entry visa) to airports. Once you arrive in Vietnam Airport, you will present above documents and fee to Immigration Officer at Visa upon Arrival area. You will collect your stamped visa there. That is all about Vietnam visa on arrival. Simple and easy, isn’t it ? If you do not have much time and want to save your expense, getting Vietnam visa on arrival  is the most beneficial way.

column1: 8879,"[:en]Is Vietnam visa on arrival legitimate?[:zh]越南落地签合法吗？[:]","[:en]

column2: You must once hear about the word Vietnam visa on arrival or VOA, which is an electronic document issued by the Vietnam Immigration Department that you need to submit for Immigration officer when you are upon Vietnam international airports .

Vietnam visa on arrival is legitimate because it is regulated in Vietnam immigration laws and then it is endorsed by the Vietnamese government. It is processed legitimately. You may know that your visa on arrival paperwork is not a full visa but a required document to get visa stamped  and allows you to enter Vietnam legally.

Vietnam visa on arrival is stated in the Ordinance on Entry, Exit and Residence of Foreigners in Vietnam, Chapter III, Article 6, foreigners are granted entry at International Border gate points with following conditions:
1. They enter for funerals of their relatives, for visits to their seriously ill relatives;
2. They depart from countries where Vietnamese diplomatic missions and/or Consulates are not available.
3. They enter for visit under programs organized by international tour enterprises of Vietnam;

4. They enter to provide urgent technical support for programs, projects, to give first- aid to seriously ill person, accident victims, to provide rescue for victims of natural disasters and epidemics in Vietnam.
5. For other urgent reasons.

Except for condition 3, in which customers will have to deal with a visa agency who will forward the applications over to the immigration office, the rest of conditions need to be verified and pre-approved by Vietnamese embassies and consulates abroad.

Vietnam has allowed travel agencies to obtain a visa on arrival for their customers on their behalf. Originally, travelers have to find out their Vietnam Embassies at their country and come there to ask for visa and come back there again to take visa on an agreed date. This way is not convenient and time-consuming for people who are far away from the Vietnam Embassies at their country. Even, previously, only travelers booking a tour in Vietnam can have their visa offered by the travel agent that obtained an international tour operator license. However, since 2005, Vietnam visa on arrival has changed and make it easier to obtain than before. Most travel agencies in Vietnam now can arrange the approval letter for their tourists with their service fee.
For futher information about Vietnam visa on arrival, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or follow us here!
Apply online now!
你可能第一次听到越南落地签或VOA，由越南入境事务处签发的一份电子文件，当你到达越南国际机场时你需要提交给入境官员的文件。越南落地签是合法的，因为它是在越南的移民法律规范内的，是由越南政府批准的。是合法办理的。你可能知道你的落地签纸质文件不是完整的签证，但是要获得落地签所需的文件，盖了章是允许你合法进入越南的。
越南落地签在第三章，第六条条例规定，越南出入境和在越南居留的外国人，在国际关闸准许入境要满足以下条件：
1.参与其亲属的葬礼，看望重病亲属；
2.离开越南，即越南代表团和/或领事馆不适用；
3.参观由越南国际旅游企业组织的议程；
4.提供项目、方案的紧急技术支持，给一线救援重病的人，事故遇难者，越南自然灾害和流行病的受害者抢救。
5.其他紧急原因。
除了条例3，客户将不得不面对签证机构将申请转发给移民局，其它条例需要验证和越南驻外使领馆预先批准。

越南已经允许旅行社代表他们的客户获得落地签证。起初，旅客必须了解到他们自己去本国的越南大使馆要求办理签证，再在一个约定的日期回去拿签证。这种方式对那些离自己国家的越南大使馆很远的人来说是不方便又很耗时的。甚至于之前，也只有那些获得国际旅游运营牌照的旅行社能提供给预定了越南旅游的游客们签证。然而，自2005年以来，越南的落地签证已经有了改变，使其比以前更容易获得。越南的大部分旅行社现在可以为他们的旅游者安排批准函和收取服务费了。

column2: More and more Indian are travelling to Vietnam, not only for tourism but many of them are working in Vietnam. As an Indian passport holder, you not only can get Vietnam visa at Vietnam Embassy in India. You also could apply for Vietnam visa online easily at:http://vietnamvisavoa.com
The Embassy of Vietnam in India in New Delhi, India

Vietnam visa on arrival for Indian citizens
The Consulate General of Vietnam in Mumbai, India

It is situated on No B-306 Oberoi chamber New Link road andheri (w), Mumbai (Bombay) 400 053, India. The Consulate General of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam in Mumbai, India was founded in 1993 covering the consular area of urban and suburban Mumbai City and Mumbai Port.
Citizens of India can apply for a visa to Vietnam in 3 different ways:

1. They can apply for a visa to Vietnam through a travel agent in India or through online visa processors like Travisa, Travelvisapro, Traveldocs using India passport. The process and fee for Vietnam visa may vary by each agent.

3. Visa on arrival to Vietnam is quite common nowadays for Indian citizens as long as they travel to Vietnam by air only.
Whatever you want to get visa for Vietnam without going to consulate or embassy of Vietnam, let apply for visa on arrival Vietnam.

Vietnam visa on arrival is legitimated and approved by Vietnam Immigration Department for picking up visa on arrival at international airport of Vietnam. It is a kind of paperwork that allows passport holders to enter Vietnam legally. It is available to avoid the complicated procedures with their local Vietnam’s Embassies. It is a good choice for Indian citizen, in particular when they travel to Vietnam by air only. The applicants just need to submit an online application form and then get payment done online to get the approval letter sent via email from vietnamvisavoa.com. Then you can take it along to Vietnam airports, get the visa stamped there. Picking up visa at Vietnam airports is quite simple, convenient and cost saving. I. Get Vietnam visa at Vietnam embassy or consulate in China

They have to bring their original passport with at least 6 month validity, 2 passport-sized photos and visa fee in cash. You should notice that visa fee may be varied from Embassies to Embassies. Vietnam visa on arrival is an alternative way of getting Vietnam visa. This kind of visa is quite common for many people who often go abroad. Chinese people who would like to apply for this visa type, have to meet the requirements: a 6-month validity passport prior to date of travel with minimum 01 blank visa page left and traveling to Vietnam by air. The procedure is quite simple, fast and effective. Simply, they just need to fill out an online application form. column1: 8924,"[:en]Notes for ordering Vietnam visa online[:zh]网上订购越南签证的注意事项[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""margin-left:0.25in; text-align:justify"">

column2: Vietnam visa on arrival is no longer a strange term for those who often travel in foreign countries. They must know clearly how to apply for Vietnam visa online, steps for Vietnam visa application online, its validity and when they should do it for best visit.

The first condition is that they must choose traveling by air. They have to board to Vietnamese international airports. They are Noi Bai-Ha Noi, Tan Son Nhat- Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang-Da Nang and Cam Ranh- Nha Trang. If anyone changes the flight and arrives at another airport in Vietnam, there is no problem with switching between these three airports.

Secondly, so many travelers make mistake that their Vietnam visa online will get validity from the day they come to Vietnam. However, it is totally wrong. The visa will be valid since the day they apply for the visa application form online. It is not from the date they enter Vietnam so they have to make sure that they make a clear plan of when to enter before ordering a visa to Vietnam. They have to get 6 months.

Thirdly, a Vietnam visa application can be applied for 1 day to 6 months in advance. Although it takes only 2 normal working days to get the approval letter, it is recommended to apply for Vietnamese visa 1-2 weeks before the arrival date so that they can avoid some unexpected problems with payment or other administrative issues.

column2: Are  Vietnam visa for Australian passport holders required when entering Vietnam? The answer is that every Australian must apply for a visa to enter Vietnam.

column3: Vietnam visa for Australian citizens

column2: 1. Get Vietnam visa at  Embassy/Consulate of Vietnam
This is a traditional way when visa is picked up at Vietnam Embassy. There are two offices of the consulate and embassy of Vietnam in Australia:
Embassy of Vietnam in Canberra-Australia
6 Timbarra Cres., Malley Canberra, ACT 2606, Australia
Tel: (612) 6286 6059 /(612) 6290 1549
Consular: 6290 1556
Fax: (612) 6286 4534
Consulate General of Vietnam in Sydney – Australia
Suite 205, level 2, Edgecliff Centre 203 – 233 New South Head Road, Edgecliff, NSW 2027
PO Box: 732, Edgecliff, N.S.W 2027
Tel: 02 93271912/ 0293272539
Fax: 02 93281653

You have to come to the Vietnam Embassy or Consulate General of Vietnam where is closer to your accommodation in person and you also come back there in an agreed day. To get Vietnam visa, you first need download an application form then send it with your passport, one colour passport photo, a reply paid envelope and the visa fee.

Please notice that fees are varied according to the length and purpose of your visit. So, it is quite time-consuming and may be more expensive. Because of that, Australian travelers now prefer applying for a visa on arrival to Vietnam.
2. Visa on arrival to Vietnam

Australian citizens can easily apply for visa on arrival following simple application process provided by vietnamvisavoa.com. You just need to fill in the online visa application form and follow step by step to get payment online for service fee of vietnamvisavoa.com.

The fee is varied depending on different type of visa. The standard visa to Vietnam from Australia is a single entry visa, which they just enter Vietnam once. If you plan to leave Vietnam and then return on the same trip, you need to apply for a multiple entry visa before you leave Australia. You have to apply for visa on arrival to Vietnam before you arrive in Vietnam.

Vietnam visa for Australian passport holder comprises one month single entry visa, one month multiple entry visa, three month single entry visa and three month multiple entry visa which are equal to $18,$22, $30 and $50 respectively. You just need to give the exact information as the same as their passport’s information. After receiving their payment, we will send it to the Immigration Department to issue visa approval letter. Then, after 2 normal working days, we will send them an approval letter.

Then you just need to take it along to Vietnam international airport to get their visa stamped to enter Vietnam legally. At the landing airport, it is essential to have your passport, application form, one colour passport-sized photo. Besides, you should prepare $25 for stamping fee for single entry visa and $50 for multiple entry visa to custom officials.

One thing you should remind is that you have to make sure that their visa is valid in 6 month from the date you arrive home. You can choose one of two options above. However, please notice that you are different in terms of application procedure and applicable applicants.

If getting visa on arrival is more convenient and less time-consuming, it is only applicable for those who travel to Vietnam by air only. So, if you plan to travel to Vietnam by land or sea, you should apply for a visa at the nearest Vietnam embassy or contact the cruise operator for visa procedure if you travel on a cruise ship.

2.越南落地签澳大利亚公民通过vietnamvisavoa.com网站提供的简单的申请程序可以很容易地申请落地签。你只需要在网上填写签证申请表，并跟着步骤一步步到网上支付给vietnamvisavoa.com服务费。该费用是根据不同类型的签证变化的，来自澳大利亚的越南的标准签证是单次入境签证，他们只能进入越南一次。如果您打算离开越南，然后以相同的行程返回越南，您需要在离开澳大利亚前申请多次入境签证。在你到底越南之前你必须申请越南落地签。越南签证对澳大利亚护照持有者包括一个月单次入境签证，一个月多次入境签证，三个月单次入境签证和三个月多次入境签证，分别等于18美金，22美金，30美金和50美金。你只需要给出和护照上的信息一样的确切信息即可。收到付款后，我们会把信息发送到入境事务处签发签证批准函。然后，2个正常工作日之后，我们会给他们发送批准函。然后你只需要带着它到越南国际机场拿签证盖章，合法进入越南。在机场着陆，护照，申请表，一张彩色护照尺寸照片是必不可少的。此外，你应该准备25美金单次入境签证印章费和50美金多次入境签证印章费给海关官员。你应该要记住，你必须确保从你回家之日起签证有效期要有6个月。你可以选择上面2个选项的其中一个。但是，请注意，您在申请程序和申请适用方面是不同的。如果获取落地签更加方便，耗时少，但它仅适用于那些乘飞机前往越南旅游的人。所以，如果你计划通过陆路或海路前往越南旅游，你应该在最近的越南大使馆申请签证或如果你是游轮旅行的话你要联系游轮运营商办理签证手续。有关越南签证的详细信息，请通过onlinevietnamvisa24h@gmail.com查看。

column1: 8977,"[:en]Vietnam visa exemption certificate[:zh]越南签证豁免证书[:]","[:en]

column2: A Vietnam visa exemption certificate is an official form issued by the Immigration Department or Diplomatic Mission of Vietnam in foreign countries granted to foreigners or Vietnamese residents overseas. With Vietnam visa exemption, holders enter Vietnam and are permitted to stay continously for 6 months from the date of entry.
Vietnam visa exemption certificate are valid for 5 years .Vietnam visa exemption certificate can be a stamped certificate or detached certificate.
The following required documents are attached to application for Vietnam visa exemption certificate for Vietnamese residents overseas and for foreigners.
Certificate of Visa exemption.
1. For Vietnamese residents abroad
a. 01 application form for Vietnam visa exemption certificate.
b. 02 recent 4 x 6cm photos with white background, straight face,  bare head, no colored glasses (01 photo attached to the application form and 01 spare photo)

c. Foreign passports or equivalent documents with validity of at least 6 months up to date of entry. If the applicant does not have a passport, he/she must submit a permanent residents permit  issued by foreign authorities with the validity of at least 6 months up  to the date of entry (with attached copy for competent authority to file)
d. One of the following documents (attached copy for competent authority to file) if available:
e. In case of not having documents listed at section (d), the following documents could be submitted:
2. For holders of foreign passports being wives, husbands, and children of a Vietnamese citizen or Vietnamese residing abroad
a. 01 application form for a Vietnam visa exemption certificate.
b. 02 recent 4 x 6 cm photos with white background, straight face, bare head, without colored glasses. (01 attached to the application form, 01 spare photo).
c. A foreign passport with validity of at least 6 months up to date of entry (a copy attached for competent authority to file)
d. One of documents proving relationship between wives/husbands/children and the Vietnamese residing abroad (a copy attached for competent authority to file)
-  Certificate of Marriage
- Certificate of Birth
- A Certificate of relationship with farther, mother, children;
- Other valid documents as regulated by the Vietnamese Law.
- Decision of Adoption

If anyone would like to apply for the re-issuance the Vietnam visa exemption certificate because of losing or expiring certificate of visa exemption or issuance of new passport, at the initial competent authorities, the applicant only needs to submit 01 applicaltion form with no certification of Vietnamese residing abroad required. If anyone would like to apply for re-issuance of Certificate of visa exemption due to visa exemption certificate lost or expired not submitted to the initial issuing agency, the applicant is required to submit all the documents as per the procedures applied to first-time issuance of the certificate of Vietnam visa exemption.

Visa application forms, original passports/permanent residence certificates and other documents proving Vietnamese citizenship and relationship to Vietnamese citizens or overseas Vietnamese can be sent directly or via post.

A competent agency shall grant a certificate of visa exemption will be within 7 working days after receiving a valid dossier. According to the Ministry of Finance, first issuance of certificate visa exemption is $20 and $10 for the second issuance of Vietnam visa exemption certificate.
For futher information about Vietnam visa exemption certificate, please contact us at: support@vietnamvisavoa.com
越南签证豁免证书是一份由入境事务处或越南驻外国的外交使馆授予外国人或海外的越南居民的官方表格。获得豁免签证，持有者可以进入越南，并从入境之日起允许停留90天。外国护照或外国护照的代替者是护照有效期自入境之日起应至少有6个月。国外没有护照的越南人，必须持有由外国发放的自入境之日起有至少6个月以上的居留证。越南签证豁免证书有1到5年的，这取决于护照或同等于护照的文件的期限。
越南签证豁免证书可以是盖章的或者不盖章的。
下面的需求文件是附加到海外越南居民和外国人的越南签证豁免证书的申请书当中。
签证豁免证书
1.海外越南居民
a.越南签证豁免证书的申请表1份
b.近期4X6cm的白底，全脸免冠，不带有色眼镜的彩照2张（1张照片贴在申请表，1张照片备用）
c.外国护照或同等于护照的文件自入境之日起有效期至少6个月。如果申请者没有护照，他/她必须提交一份由外国机构颁发的自入境之日起至少6个月有效期的永久居民证（附主管当局的文件复印件）
d.如果适用，以下文件其中一份可用（主管当局的文件复印件）
e. 如果（d）条列出的文件没有的情况下，可以提交下列文件：
2.对于外国护照的越南公民的妻子，丈夫，子女或越南驻国外持有者
a.越南签证豁免证书申请表1份
b. 近期4X6cm的白底，全脸免冠，不带有色眼镜的彩照2张（1张照片贴在申请表，1张照片备用）
c. 外国护照自入境之日起有效期至少6个月（附主管机关的文件复印件）
d.能证明越南海外居民的妻子/丈夫/小孩的亲属关系的文件（附主管机关文件复印件）
-结婚证
-出生证
-有父亲，母亲，儿童关系的证明;
-由越南法律规定的其他有效证件
-收养判决
如果有人因为丢失或过期的签证豁免证书或签发新护照要申请补发的话，在初始的主管机关，申请人只需要提交1份申请表，没有认证的越南海外同胞是必需的。如果有人因丢失或过期未提交初始发证机构想申请补发签证豁免证明书，申请人必需提交所有适用于首次申请越南签证豁免证书程序的文件。签证申请表，护照原件/永久居留证和其他文件证明越南公民身份和关系，越南公民或越南海外同胞可直接或通过邮递方式送交。
一个称职的机构在收到有效卷宗后的7个工作日内应给予签证豁免证书。根据财政部规定，一次签发签证豁免证书是20美金，第二次签发是10美金。
欲了解更多信息，请通过onlinevietnamvisa24h@gmail.com联系我们
来源：expat.com

column1: 8997,"[:en]How to get Vietnam visa online?[:zh]如何获取在线越南签证？[:]","[:en]

column2: Besides getting a Vietnam visa from a local embassy before entering the country, you are advised to get Vietnam visa online and collect it at the airport on arrival in Vietnam.

For the former, what you really pay for isn’t a visa but an approval letter that allows you to receive it to get Vietnam visa when you arrive at either Vietnam international airport. After filling out an online visa application form, vietnamvisavoa.com will email you a copy of approval letter after 2 working days. Filling out a form is not time-consuming, you just follow the prompts and click on “apply online” and pass all fields for your exact information. It is required to type your right passport number and pay online for us. Only when you already pay for it, you then get your approval letter.
How to get Vietnam visa online ?

It is important to note that the visa must be applied for online in advance before arrival in Vietnam. You should know that processing to obtain approval letter is performed by local travel agents and not the Embassy Vietnam. Please also note that this process will not work for those arriving at any other airport or at a land border. You will need to get a Vietnam visa from an embassy in the traditional way.
Why should get Vietnam visa online?

The reason why we prefer the Vietnam visa on arrival is because it is more convenient, not time-consuming and cheaper. If someone could not arrive from the home country or live near the embassy to get a traditional visa in person, it turns out that getting a VOA is quicker, cheaper and easier than getting one at home and it is especially easy for someone traveling and not being in a steady location.
To get Vietnam visa online, there are two Vietnam visa fees: service fee and stamping fee to get Vietnam visa on arrival.
- The service fee:

Service fee of visa on arrival to Vietnam is one that you have to pay for approval letter. While many travelers can feel hard to find a good company, you should see the service fees charged for different visas. For vietnamvisavoa.com, we charge $18 for obtain the approval letter with regard to one month single entry visa. You can pay for the visas and can pay by Visa, MasterCard or PayPal.
- The stamping fee:

It is the one you have to pay to get your visa stamped after the acceptance of approval letter. The Vietnam immigration will charge you $25 for single entry visa when you arrive at the airport. You will need to bring two passport photos on you, too.

In Hanoi, after landing, you just go to Visa on Arrival counter. At the counter, you will hand over your passport, photos and then be given a form to fill out. After filling out a form, you then wait for your name to be called and then pay the stamping fee to pick up your passport with your visa inside.  If there are so many people applying for Vietnam visa fee at the same time, it can take you about 15 to 30 minutes to go through this process. So if you have any plans for your traveling, you should consider this process to ensure other plans.
For futher information about get Vietnam visa online, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or follow us here!
Let's apply to get Vietnam visa online now!
除了在进入越南之前要从当地大使馆获得签证，建议您在网上办理越南签证，在抵达越南机场时拿签证。
对于前者，你真正支付的不是签证费用，而是批准函，允许你获得批准函，当你抵达任何一个越南国际机场时可以获得越南签证。在填写在线申请表之后，vietnamvisavoa.com在2个工作日之后会用电子邮件发一份批准函复印件给你。填写表格不会耗时间，你只需要按照提示点击“网上申请”，并通过你的所有确切的信息。这需要你键入你的正确的护照号码并在线支付费用给我们。只有你已经支付了费用你才能拿到你的批准函。
重要的是要注意，签证必须在到达越南之前提前在线申请。你应该要知道，处理以获得批准函是由当地旅行社执行的而不是越南大使馆。另外还请注意，这个处理也不是那些抵达的任何机场或陆地边界执行的。否则你将需要用传统方式从大使馆获得越南签证。
这就是为什么我们宁愿办理越南落地签的原因，因为它更方便，不费时，更便宜。如果有人无法从本国的大使馆或在大使馆附近亲自拿到传统的签证，事实证明获得落地签比传统签证更快更便宜，更容易。对于不是在一个稳定的场所的旅游人士来说这是特别容易的事。
对于在线的越南签证，有两种越南签证费用：服务费和印章费。
服务费是你不得不支付批准函的费用，虽然许多旅客感觉很难找到一个好的签证公司，但是你要明白服务费的收取是根据不同的签证来收费的。对于vietnamvisavoa.com，关于一个月单次入境签证我们收取18美金获得批准函。你可以用Visa，MasterCard或PayPal支付签证费用。
后者是你必须在机场支付。印章费是你在验收了批准函之后不得不为你的签证盖章支付的费用。当你到达机场时越南移民局会收取你一个月入境签证25美金。你还需要带上2张护照照片。
在河内，着陆之后，你只要前往落地签柜台。在柜台你要递交你的护照，照片然后你会拿到一份表格填写。填写完表格之后，等待叫你的名字，然后支付印章费拿到你的护照，签证已经在你的护照里了。如果同时有许多人在申请，这个过程可能会花费15到30分钟。所以如果你有任何旅行计划，你应该考虑到这个进程，确保你的其他计划。

column1: 9041,"[:en]Vietnam visa for Canadian citizens[:zh]加拿大公民的越南签证[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Vietnam visa for Canadian citizens can be taken by two following ways:
1.      Vietnam visa for Canadian citizens: Vietnam visa at Vietnam embassy/consulate in Canada
Embassy of Vietnam in Ottawa, Canada
Address: 470 Wilbrod Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1N 6M8, CANADA
Phone: (1613) 236 0772
Fax: (1613) 236 2704
Email: vietem@istar.ca, vietnamembassy@rogers.com,
Office hours: Office hours: Monday to Friday: Morning: 9.30 a.m - 11.30 a.m Afternoon: 13.30 p.m - 16.00 p.m
However, it may take you 2-5 working days to get Vietnam Visa at Vietnam Embassy in Canada.
2.      Vietnam visa for Canadian citizens: Vietnam visa on arrival

Visa on arrival is picked up at the arrival airport and is applicable for those who are the Canadian passport holders. It is said that this alternative way is more economical and convenient than the first traditional option. Vietnam visa on arrival is applicable for those who travel by air.

It is a special advantage for those who live far from the Vietnam Embassy/ Consulate in Canada. The applicants do not have to go to the Embassy or have to send out the passport again. By using this way of getting Vietnam visa, it just takes at least 2 days for normal processing and even if you need it for urgent processing, it can take only 1 day or only 4 working hours for super urgent service to get an approval letter issued by Vietnam Immigration Department which is an official unit issuing the visa upon arrival to Vietnam.  Please notice that you have to pay $18 for the service fee for one - month single entry visa. If you want to take urgent one, please contact us for further information vietnamvisavoa.com. After you pay this fee already, we will immediately send to the Immigration Department and email you the approval letter after 2 normal working days.

When you arrive to Vietnam airport, you please print the approval letter out together with a filled entry and exit form and 2 passport sized photos. You get your visa stamped at Vietnam airport at the Immigration Department counter by submitting printed visa approval letter, passport, 2 passport-sized photos, entry and exit form and stamping fee to the in-charge officer. You will have to pay $25 for stamping fee for single entry visa to Vietnam and $50 for multiple entry visa.
For futher information about Vietnam visa for Canadian citizens, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or follow us here!
Apply for the Vietnam visa on arrival at this online visa application form!
加拿大公民的越南签证可以采取以下两种方式：
1.加拿大公民的越南签证：在越南驻加拿大大使馆/领事馆的越南签证
越南驻渥太华大使馆，加拿大

但是，在越南驻加大使馆拿到越南签证可能需要2-5个工作日。
2.加拿大公民的越南签证：越南落地签

落地签是在到达机场拿，这适用于那些加拿大护照持有者。据说这种替代方式比第一种传统的方式更为经济和方便。越南落地签适用于那些乘坐飞机旅行的人。在加拿大对于那些住的离越南大使馆/领事馆的人来说特别有优势。申请者不必亲自到使馆或不得不再寄送护照。用这种方式获得签证，正常来说这只需要2天处理，即使你需要紧急处理，也只需要1天，特别紧急只需要4个小时，就能获得由官方发放签证的部门-越南入境事务处签发的抵达越南时的批准函。请注意，你必须为一个月单次入境签证支付18美金的服务费。如果要采取紧急处理，请联系我们获取更多信息vietnamvisavoa.com。在你已经支付了费用之后，我们会立即想入境事务处发送申请，在2个正常工作日把批准函发送电子邮件给你。
当你到达越南机场，请你打印批准函连同一份填好的出入境表格和2张护照尺寸照片一起，你在越南机场的入境事务处柜台提交打印出来的签证批准函，护照，2张护照尺寸照片，出入境表格和支付给入境官员的印章费，拿到你盖了章的签证。你将需要支付单次入境签证25美金的印章费和多次入境签证50美金的印章费。
在这个在线申请表申请越南落地签吧！

column1: 9052,"[:en]Do Singaporean need to apply for Vietnam visa online?[:zh]新加坡人需要在线申请越南签证吗？[:]","[:en]

column2: Vietnam granted 30-day visa free for the Singapore passport holders for every type of passports and immigration reasons if the meet the conditions required by Vietnam law.

If people could not make sure to stay in Vietnam for less than 30 days, they should apply for a visa from the beginning because it is currently difficult to extend visa and the fee for visa extension in Vietnam is costly. Nowadays, fortunately, Singapore passport holders feel it easier to apply for Vietnam visa online, as there are two available options for this matter.
1. Apply for Vietnam visa at Vietnam Embassy

This is suitable for those who wish to travel by land/sea or to obtain a fully-stamped visa on passport before departure. It is recommended to contact the nearest Vietnam Embassy for visa application. Also, it is good for those who stay nearly the Vietnam Embassy.  Please notice that the processing time is 4 to 5 working days and your original passport required to be submitted together with you visa application. Currently, the Vietnam Embassy is located in Singapore.
Embassy of Vietnam in Singapore
Address: 10 Leedon Park St., SINGAPORE 267887
Phone: (65) 64625994
Fax: (65) 6462 5936
Email: vnemb@singnet.com.sg
2. Apply for Vietnam visa online at vietnamvisavoa.com

Apply for Vietnam visa online is said to be a convenient option for Singaporean. It is very beneficial for those who live far from the Vietnam Embassy and do not have to send their passports away by postal mail.

The procedure is not difficult but rather simple. When you finish your application for Vietnam visa online at vietnamvisavoa.com, you will receive from us a pre-approval letter for your visa application in advance after 02 working days at maximum for normal service or one working day after you payment online for our service fee. We charge $18 for one month single entry visa and $22 for three month single entry visa. Then, you will have your visa stamped after landing at Vietnamese international airport. You are required to pay $25 for single entry visa and $50 for multiple entry visas for stamping fee at the Immigration Department counter.
You should remember that though visa on arrival features a special advantage, especially to those living far from Vietnam Embassy, and it is applicable for foreigners traveling to Vietnam by air.
For futher information about apply for Vietnam visa online, please contact us via support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.94 127 92 89 or follow us here!
Apply for visa on arrival to Vietnam at Vietnam visa application form !

如果人们不能确保在越南停留至少30天的话，他们应该一开始就申请签证，因为现在很难延迟签证，并且签证延期的费用在越南很高。如今，幸运的是，新加坡人很容易申请越南签证了，因为他们有两种可选的签证方式。
1.在越南使馆申请越南签证
这适合那些希望通过陆路或海路旅游的人，可以在出发之前得到在护照上的完全盖章的签证。建议联系最近的越南大使馆申请签证。此外，这还对那些离越南大使馆近的人更有利。请注意，处理签证的时间是4到5个工作日，你的护照原件需要和你的签证申请一起提交。目前，越南大使馆已经设在新加坡了。
越南驻新加坡大使馆
地址：新加坡267887丽敦公园街10号
电话：(65) 64625994
传真：(65) 6462 5936
电子邮件：vnemb@singnet.com.sg

column2: Vietnam visa requirement for Myanmar passport holders
The agreement between Vietnam and Myanmar signed on October 26th, 2013 allowed to waive visa for their citizens visiting the other country within 14 days.

However, if Myanmar passport holders wish to stay in Vietnam for more than 14 days, they are advised to apply for Vietnam visa. There are two options for them to get Vietnam visa. They either can get visa to Vietnam by contacting the closest Vietnam Embassy for visa application to Vietnam or they can ask for Vietnam visa online/ visa on arrival at http://vietnamvisavoa.com/ and get stamped visa onto their passport once they arrive in Vietnam Airport.
For those who want to apply for visa from Vietnam Embassy, they have to check out the address of Vietnam Embassy in Myanmar.
Embassy of Vietnam in Yangon, Myanmar
Address: Building No.70-72, Thanlwin Road, Bahan Township, Yangon
Phone: 95-1- 511305, 9
Fax: 95-1- 514897
Email: vnembmyr@cybertech.net.mm
Office Hours: Monday to Friday: 08.00 – 12.00; 13.00 – 16.30

Their required paperwork is a Myanmar passport with at least six months validity, 2 passport-sized photos, fee. The original passport is required to be submitted together with your visa application. The fee will vary from different embassies. It normally takes 5-7 working days to get the stamped visa. Sometimes, the progress of your application is failed because of missing passport, important documents.
Apply for Vietnam online/ Vietnam visa on arrival is highly appreciated at lower cost and simple process at vietnamvisavoa.com

Many people prefer Visa on arrival as it is more convenient and cost saving especially for those who live far away from Vietnam Embassies and those do not wish to send their passports away via post. They just have to follow a very simple procedure. The applicants just need to fill out an application form online with the information on their passport. Then pay for service fee online to get the visa letter via registered email within 1- 2 working days (1 working day for urgent service and 2 working days for normal service). They will take with them to Vietnam these documents: Passport, Vietnamese visa approval letter, Vietnamese visa application form (2 passport photos are attached) and stamping fee in cash ($25 US for single entry visa and $ 50 US for multiple entry visa). At Vietnam airport, they will present these documents to Immigration Officer at Visa upon arrival area to get stamped visa on their passport.

column1: 9198,"[:en]Important notes for getting Vietnam visa on arrival[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: Pre-arranged Vietnam visa on arrival has been much more easier than ever before. You just  need to remember some notes before getting visa on arrival to Vietnam.
1. Passport validity

Validity of your passport is very important because you cannot apply for a Vietnam visa if your passport is going to expired. Please make sure that your passport must be at least 6 month validity. In case you can not renew your passport, you should check with your airline as they may not let you get on board if your passport is not valid for 6 months.
2. Travel by airplane

Vietnam visa on arrival is applicable for those traveling by air only. With the approval letter, you can pick up your stamped visa at any Vietnam International airports. If you take other means of transports such as: bus, boat, cruise ...ect., you cannot take visa on arrival to Vietnam. In such cases, you must get your Vietnam visa done at Vietnam Embassy/Consulate before heading to Vietnam.
3. Date of approval

Your visa letter will be started on the arrival date which you register on the visa application form when you submit the form. It is not counted from the day you come to Vietnam international airports. In case you do not you’re your exact travel dates, you should provide the earliest date you plan to arrive. You are able to enter Vietnam at any time within your visa validity.

Take an example, if you apply for a one-month visa and submit your arrival date as June 30, 2016, the visa letter will be valid from Jun 30, 2016. You can arrive at anytime between June 30th and July 30th but you must leave the country by July 30, 2016.

Also please note that the approval letter cannot be amended once it is issued. If you wish to arrive earlier than the date stated on the approval letter, you are required to apply for a new approval letter.
4. When to apply for Vietnam visa online.

It is important to note that visa must be applied online in advance. Although it normally takes only 1-2 working days to get your visa approved, you are strongly advised to apply for a Vietnam visa from 1-2 weeks before your arrival date to avoid any extra payment or other administrative issues.
5. Credit/debit card for online payment

Before applying for a visa on arrival to Vietnam, make sure that you are available with Visa or Master Card, Paypal, Western Union or Bank Transfer. Making payment online with your Cards/ Paypal is much more recommended which saves your time and money.
6. Photos to bring along
You need to prepare 2 passport-sized photos and of course, you could not forget to bring the printed approval letter along to the Vietnam international.

Let's apply for visa on arrival to Vietnam with vietnamvisavoa.com now to get more benefits and do not hesitate to contact us if you have any doubts  about Vietnam visa on arrival or hotline: +84.94 127 92 89.
Apply online now!

After applying for Vietnam visa on arrival online by filling out one online visa application form and getting payment online, you will have to go through visa procedures at Vietnam airport of getting visa stamped and then legally enter Vietnam.
Upon arrival at the Vietnam airport, you need to present your approval letter to the Immigration officer. See how to get the Vietnam visa approval letter here.
You should remember that there are 5 things packed in your arrival document checklist below:
1.      Your passport(at least 6 month validity)
2.      2 passport-sized photos
3.      Visa approval letter
4.      A copy of entry and exit form(download from website or available at airports)
5.      Cash (preferred USD or VND currencies)
Get your boarding pass with a valid passport and Vietnam visa

After landing, at Hanoi airport, you just head straight to Customs Clearance area, Immigration Office is right next to the Customs and before Baggage Claims. At Ho Chi Minh airport, you also head straight to Immigration Area. After that, you have to submit 5 required documents above.

Keep in mind that once you leave the country, you need a passport of at least 6 month validity. This rule is applied for  all international travel, including  the US and Canada but excluding EU member countries. If you are coming toVietnam you need to have both a valid passport and a valid Vietnam visa.

At the airport, you will asked for your passport and visa at the time of check-in, no matter why you fly from. Vietnam visa can either be a ready visa stamp into  your passport if getting visa at Vietnam Embassy or a signed visa approval letter of applying for Vietnam visa on arrival.
Then, you will be given a boarding pass to fly to Vietnam. When you arrive in one of the international airports, you will see 2 bright signs besides the Customs area, visa-on-arrival or landing visa.
If you already possess a visa stamped when you get the Vietnam visa at Vietnam embassy, you just head straight to the Custom area, hand in your passport for checking and proceed to the baggage area.

With regard to visa on arrival to Vietnam, you have to present the documents above and receive the visa stamp. To receive your stamped visa, you will pay $25USD for single entry visa and $50USD for multiple entry visa as the stamping fee to Immigration Department. You are recommended to pay in USD or VND dong currencies to speed up the visa process at the Vietnam international airports.
After getting visa stamped onto the passport, collect your luggage and pass through the Customs.
Please note that the visa procedures at the airport takes normally 15-20 minutes, depending on the time and day you arrive.

If you need to speed up the process at the airports, you can get our fast track service to help you to be treated as a VIP guest, to get out of the airport less than 15 waiting minutes. To understand more about this service, please see Vietnam airport fast track service.
For further details, please apply for Vietnam visa on arrival here and do not hesitate to contact us to understand more about visa procedures at Vietnam airport via support@vietnamvisavoa.com

column1: 9213,"[:en]What to do when overstaying in Vietnam ?[:]","[:en]

column2: What should I do for overstaying in Vietnam? The answer is that you  must pay fine for overstaying and must do a Vietnam visa extension.
The visa expiration date is shown on the visa along with the visa issue date. The time between issue date and expiration date is called visa validity.
Expired Vietnam visa.

Many foreigners who are living in Vietnam do not pay attention to their own visa validity until leaving. The problem is that the longer they overstay, the more complicated the procedure is and the higher penalty that they need to pay for.

To leave Vietnam with an expired visa, they first must contact to the Immigration Office in their local area or contact visa agent in Vietnam as soon as possible so that the visa agent can act as a sponsor to deal with their problem on their behalf. If they overstay only 1 or 2 days, it is suggested to pay fine to the Immigration Officer at Vietnam airport when they leave.

In case the Vietnam visa has already expired more than three days and they still want to stay in Vietnam with the expired visa, they should immediately contact vietnamvisavoa.com to get Vietnam visa extension. The process of Vietnam visa extension takes a few days more and the minimum length of extension is one month.
For this situation, they have to pay two types of fee:
- Fine for overstaying in Vientam
- Extension fee/exit visa fee
The extension fee is paid in case they can get visa extension and exit visa fee in case they are forced to leave the country.

One additional thing to note down is that for those overstaying in Vietnam for long period; maybe one month upward, the Vietnam Immigration Department may need to track their legal activity record of their staying period in Vietnam. It is advisable that they should not commit any crime or illegal action; the situation will be more complicated.
To avoid any trouble which may cause while traveling or existing Vietnam, all travelers should pay attention to their Vietnam visa validity.

Further information about Vietnam visa, expired Vietnam visa and specific solutions for overstaying Vietnam visa, please kindly contact us via email support@vietnamvisavoa.com or hotline: +84.94 127 92 89.

column1: 9253,"[:en]How to pay for Vietnam visa fees ?[:]","[:en]<h2 style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: When you apply for Vietnam visa online, you would need to pay for 2 kinds of Vietnam visa fees: service fee and stamping fee.

1. Vietnam visa service fee
The Vietnam visa service fee is paid for our company for the arrangement of the Vietnam visa pre-approved letter so that you can present this document to Immigration and fly into Vietnam.
You could pay for Vietnam visa service fee by:
A. Settle the payment via PayPal (www.Paypal.Com)

Paypal is the payment gateway by Credit card, or by itself, this is the most popular pocket payment now. This payment gateway accepts Credit/Debit card like Visa Card, Master Card, America Express, Dinner Club and many more.

Western UNION is known as for a long time, this is the easiest way of transferring money. The service provider can receive cash in 15-20 minutes after the client make successful transaction. However, this is not recommended because it costs much money for transfering service fee.
If you use Western UNION to pay for Vietnam visa service fee, please send us your payment receipt along with the money transfers control number (MTCN).
C. Settle the payment via bank transfer

This is the ultimate way to pay for service fee but it is a bit complicated for those who do not know how to use online banking. This transfer will often take longer than the above manners and is also costly for transfering money.

After getting bank account detail from us, you can go wire the money from your bank account to our Bank account. Please inform us by email, together with bank transfer receipt so that we can process the visa for you on time, avoid losing precious time of your report.
D. Settle the payment directly at office
If you cannot choose any of above methods, you can ask your relative to pay us directly at our office.
Notes:
-  We use USD (US Dollar) as list price for all our services.
2. Vietnam visa stamping fee

The Vietnam visa stamping fee is paid directly to Immigration officer at Visa upon arrival area at Vietnam airports when you arrive. You must pay the fee in cash in USD to get stamped visa on your passport. You have to pay $25USD and $50USD for single entry visa and multiple entry visa consecutively.

column1: 9259,"[:en]How to get tourist Vietnam visa?[:]","[:en]

column2: This is the information on how to apply for tourist Vietnam visa on arrival.

There are 4 typical type of Vietnam visas for tourist purpose: one-month single entry visa, one-month multiple entry visa, 3 month single entry and three-month multiple entry visa. The most popular type for tourist visa is 1 month single entry visa which valids for 30 days and good for 1 entry. Tourist Vietnam visa can be extended once you are in Vietnam and this visa type is good for tourism purpose only.
Below we will share with you how to get tourist Vietnam visa on arrival.
1.    Apply online for a Vietnamese visa approval letter

In order get your Vietnam visa on arrival, you first must submit a visa application form at vietnamvisavoa.com. You will fill in the form with your personal information such as your full name( name order is not important, so you can place either the surname or first name first); your date of birth; nationality, your passport number, date of arrival and visa type.
<h3 style=""text-align:center"">

column3: Tourist Vietnam visa application form online.

column2: Please take a note that your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of arrival. Date of arrival is not necessarily exact; you might fill in with proposed date of arrival as you can enter Vietnam at any time within your visa validity.
2.    Make payment online for service fee of tourist Vietnam visa

For tourist Vietnam visa, you have to pay the service fee for vietnamvisavoa.com online. Service fee may change depend upon your visa type and your nationality. Normally, for one month single entry visa, we charge you $18 USD; for one month multiple entry visa, it is $23 USD. You can pay this fee by Mastercard, Paypal, Western Union, Asia Commercial Bank etc.

After your payment is received, we will send your visa request to Vietnam Immigration Department and the visa letter will be ready in your email within 1 or 2 working days ( one working day for urgent service and 2 working days for normal service). Please remember to write down your correct email address to make sure that you receive our email. Incase you would like to get Vietnam visa letter urgently, we do have the rush visa service that can process your visa within one day or even within several hours. Just be aware that the fee for it will be a bit more expensive.
3.    Make payment for stamping fee of tourist Vietnam visa

You will take your flight to Vietnam with your printed visa approval letter with your two passport-sized photos (4x6cm), Vietnamese visa application form, your original passport to Vietnam international airports.
